2478  /* some strange lock wait state.. */
2479  er_set (ER_WARNING_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_STRANGE_LOCK_WAIT, 5, thrd_ptr->lockwait,
2480  thrd_ptr->lockwait_state, thrd_ptr->index, thrd_ptr->get_posix_id (), thrd_ptr->tran_index);
2481  }
2482  /* The current thread has already been waken up by other threads. The current thread might have held the
2483  * lock. or with any other reason....... even if it is a thread of the deadlock victim. */
2484  /* release the thread entry mutex */
2485  thread_unlock_entry (thrd_ptr);
2486  }
2487  }
2488  return wakeup_first;
2489 }
2490 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
2491 
2492 
2493 /*
2494  * Private Functions Group: grant lock requests of blocked threads
2495  * - lock_grant_blocked_holder()
2496  * - lock_grant_blocked_waiter()
2497  * - lock_grant_blocked_waiter_partial()
2498  */
2499 
2500 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
2501 /*
2502  * lock_grant_blocked_holder - Grant blocked holders
2503  *
2504  * return:
2505  *
2506  * res_ptr(in): This function grants blocked holders whose blocked lock mode is
2507  * compatible with all the granted lock mode of non-blocked holders.
2508  */
2509 static void
2510 lock_grant_blocked_holder (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, LK_RES * res_ptr)
2511 {
2512  LK_ENTRY *prev_holder;
2513  LK_ENTRY *holder, *h, *prev;
2514  LOCK mode;
2515  LOCK_COMPATIBILITY compat;
2516 
2517  /* The caller is holding a resource mutex */
2518 
2519  prev_holder = NULL;
2520  holder = res_ptr->holder;
2521  while (holder != NULL && holder->blocked_mode != NULL_LOCK)
2522  {
2523  /* there are some blocked holders */
2524  mode = NULL_LOCK;
2525  for (h = holder->next; h != NULL; h = h->next)
2526  {
2527  assert (h->granted_mode >= NULL_LOCK && mode >= NULL_LOCK);
2528  mode = lock_Conv[h->granted_mode][mode];
2529  assert (mode != NA_LOCK);
2530  }
2531 
2532  assert (holder->blocked_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
2533  compat = lock_Comp[holder->blocked_mode][mode];
2534  assert (compat != LOCK_COMPAT_UNKNOWN);
2535 
2536  if (compat == LOCK_COMPAT_NO)
2537  {
2538  break; /* stop the granting */
2539  }
2540 
2541  /* compatible: grant it */
2542 
2543  /* hold the thread entry mutex */
2544  thread_lock_entry (holder->thrd_entry);
2545 
2546  /* check if the thread is still waiting on a lock */
2547  if (LK_IS_LOCKWAIT_THREAD (holder->thrd_entry))
2548  {
2549  /* the thread is still waiting on a lock */
2550 
2551  /* reposition the lock entry according to UPR */
2552  for (prev = holder, h = holder->next; h != NULL; prev = h, h = h->next)
2553  {
2554  if (h->blocked_mode == NULL_LOCK)
2555  {
2556  break;
2557  }
2558  }
2559  if (prev != holder)
2560  { /* reposition it */
2561  /* remove it */
2562  if (prev_holder == NULL)
2563  {
2564  res_ptr->holder = holder->next;
2565  }
2566  else
2567  {
2568  prev_holder->next = holder->next;
2569  }
2570  /* insert it */
2571  holder->next = prev->next;
2572  prev->next = holder;
2573  }
2574 
2575  /* change granted_mode and blocked_mode */
2576  holder->granted_mode = holder->blocked_mode;
2577  holder->blocked_mode = NULL_LOCK;
2578 
2579  /* reflect the granted lock in the non2pl list */
2580  lock_update_non2pl_list (thread_p, res_ptr, holder->tran_index, holder->granted_mode);
2581 
2582  /* Record number of acquired locks */
2583  perfmon_inc_stat (thread_p, PSTAT_LK_NUM_ACQUIRED_ON_OBJECTS);
2584 #if defined(LK_TRACE_OBJECT)
2585  LK_MSG_LOCK_ACQUIRED (entry_ptr);
2586 #endif /* LK_TRACE_OBJECT */
2587  /* wake up the blocked holder */
2588  lock_resume (holder, LOCK_RESUMED);
2589  }
2590  else
2591  {
2592  if (holder->thrd_entry->lockwait != NULL || holder->thrd_entry->lockwait_state == (int) LOCK_SUSPENDED)
2593  {
2594  /* some strange lock wait state.. */
2595  er_set (ER_WARNING_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_STRANGE_LOCK_WAIT, 5, holder->thrd_entry->lockwait,
2596  holder->thrd_entry->lockwait_state, holder->thrd_entry->index,
2597  holder->thrd_entry->get_posix_id (), holder->thrd_entry->tran_index);
2598  }
2599  /* The thread is not waiting for a lock, currently. That is, the thread has already been waked up by timeout,
2600  * deadlock victim or interrupt. In this case, we have nothing to do since the thread itself will remove this
2601  * lock entry. */
2602  thread_unlock_entry (holder->thrd_entry);
2603  prev_holder = holder;
2604  }
2605 
2606  if (prev_holder == NULL)
2607  {
2608  holder = res_ptr->holder;
2609  }
2610  else
2611  {
2612  holder = prev_holder->next;
2613  }
2614  }
2615 
2616 }
2617 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
2618 
2619 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
2620 /*
2621  * lock_grant_blocked_waiter - Grant blocked waiters
2622  *
2623  * return:
2624  *
2625  * res_ptr(in): This function grants blocked waiters whose blocked lock mode is
2626  * compatible with the total mode of lock holders.
2627  */
2628 static int
2629 lock_grant_blocked_waiter (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, LK_RES * res_ptr)
2630 {
2631  LK_ENTRY *prev_waiter;
2632  LK_ENTRY *waiter, *w;
2633  LOCK mode;
2634  bool change_total_waiters_mode = false;
2635  int error_code = NO_ERROR;
2636  LOCK_COMPATIBILITY compat;
2637 
2638  /* The caller is holding a resource mutex */
2639 
2640  prev_waiter = NULL;
2641  waiter = res_ptr->waiter;
2642  while (waiter != NULL)
2643  {
2644  assert (waiter->blocked_mode >= NULL_LOCK && res_ptr->total_holders_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
2645  compat = lock_Comp[waiter->blocked_mode][res_ptr->total_holders_mode];
2646  assert (compat != LOCK_COMPAT_UNKNOWN);
2647 
2648  if (compat == LOCK_COMPAT_NO)
2649  {
2650  break; /* stop the granting */
2651  }
2652 
2653  /* compatible: grant it */
2654  /* hold the thread entry mutex */
2655  thread_lock_entry (waiter->thrd_entry);
2656 
2657  /* check if the thread is still waiting for a lock */
2658  if (LK_IS_LOCKWAIT_THREAD (waiter->thrd_entry))
2659  {
2660  int owner_tran_index;
2661 
2662  /* The thread is still waiting for a lock. */
2663  change_total_waiters_mode = true;
2664 
2665  /* remove the lock entry from the waiter */
2666  if (prev_waiter == NULL)
2667  {
2668  res_ptr->waiter = waiter->next;
2669  }
2670  else
2671  {
2672  prev_waiter->next = waiter->next;
2673  }
2674 
2675  /* change granted_mode and blocked_mode of the entry */
2676  waiter->granted_mode = waiter->blocked_mode;
2677  waiter->blocked_mode = NULL_LOCK;
2678 
2679  /* position the lock entry in the holder list */
2680  lock_position_holder_entry (res_ptr, waiter);
2681 
2682  /* change total_holders_mode */
2683  assert (waiter->granted_mode >= NULL_LOCK && res_ptr->total_holders_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
2684  res_ptr->total_holders_mode = lock_Conv[waiter->granted_mode][res_ptr->total_holders_mode];
2685  assert (res_ptr->total_holders_mode != NA_LOCK);
2686 
2687  /* insert the lock entry into transaction hold list. */
2688  owner_tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (waiter->thrd_entry);
2689  lock_insert_into_tran_hold_list (waiter, owner_tran_index);
2690 
2691  /* reflect the granted lock in the non2pl list */
2692  lock_update_non2pl_list (thread_p, res_ptr, waiter->tran_index, waiter->granted_mode);
2693 
2694  /* Record number of acquired locks */
2695  perfmon_inc_stat (thread_p, PSTAT_LK_NUM_ACQUIRED_ON_OBJECTS);
2696 #if defined(LK_TRACE_OBJECT)
2697  LK_MSG_LOCK_ACQUIRED (entry_ptr);
2698 #endif /* LK_TRACE_OBJECT */
2699 
2700  /* wake up the blocked waiter */
2701  lock_resume (waiter, LOCK_RESUMED);
2702  }
2703  else
2704  {
2705  if (waiter->thrd_entry->lockwait != NULL || waiter->thrd_entry->lockwait_state == (int) LOCK_SUSPENDED)
2706  {
2707  /* some strange lock wait state.. */
2708  er_set (ER_WARNING_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_STRANGE_LOCK_WAIT, 5, waiter->thrd_entry->lockwait,
2709  waiter->thrd_entry->lockwait_state, waiter->thrd_entry->index,
2710  waiter->thrd_entry->get_posix_id (), waiter->thrd_entry->tran_index);
2711  error_code = ER_LK_STRANGE_LOCK_WAIT;
2712  }
2713  /* The thread is not waiting on the lock, currently. That is, the thread has already been waken up by lock
2714  * timeout, deadlock victim or interrupt. In this case, we have nothing to do since the thread itself will
2715  * remove this lock entry. */
2716  thread_unlock_entry (waiter->thrd_entry);
2717  prev_waiter = waiter;
2718  }
2719 
2720  if (prev_waiter == NULL)
2721  {
2722  waiter = res_ptr->waiter;
2723  }
2724  else
2725  {
2726  waiter = prev_waiter->next;
2727  }
2728  }
2729 
2730  if (change_total_waiters_mode == true)
2731  {
2732  mode = NULL_LOCK;
2733  for (w = res_ptr->waiter; w != NULL; w = w->next)
2734  {
2735  assert (w->blocked_mode >= NULL_LOCK && mode >= NULL_LOCK);
2736  mode = lock_Conv[w->blocked_mode][mode];
2737  assert (mode != NA_LOCK);
2738  }
2739  res_ptr->total_waiters_mode = mode;
2740  }
2741 
2742  return error_code;
2743 }
2744 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
2745 
2746 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
2747 /*
2748  * lock_grant_blocked_waiter_partial - Grant blocked waiters partially
2749  *
2750  * return:
2751  *
2752  * res_ptr(in):
2753  * from_whom(in):
2754  *
2755  * Note:This function grants blocked waiters that are located from from_whom
2756  * to the end of waiter list whose blocked lock mode is compatible with
2757  * all the blocked mode of the previous lock waiters and the total mode
2758  * of lock holders.
2759  */
2760 static void
2761 lock_grant_blocked_waiter_partial (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, LK_RES * res_ptr, LK_ENTRY * from_whom)
2762 {
2763  LK_ENTRY *prev_check;
2764  LK_ENTRY *check, *i;
2765  LOCK mode;
2766  LOCK_COMPATIBILITY compat;
2767 
2768  /* the caller is holding a resource mutex */
2769 
2770  mode = NULL_LOCK;
2771  prev_check = NULL;
2772  check = res_ptr->waiter;
2773  while (check != from_whom)
2774  {
2775  assert (check->blocked_mode >= NULL_LOCK && mode >= NULL_LOCK);
2776  mode = lock_Conv[check->blocked_mode][mode];
2777  assert (mode != NA_LOCK);
2778 
2779  prev_check = check;
2780  check = check->next;
2781  }
2782 
2783  /* check = from_whom; */
2784  while (check != NULL)
2785  {
2786  assert (check->blocked_mode >= NULL_LOCK && mode >= NULL_LOCK);
2787  compat = lock_Comp[check->blocked_mode][mode];
2788  assert (compat != LOCK_COMPAT_UNKNOWN);
2789 
2790  if (compat != LOCK_COMPAT_YES)
2791  {
2792  break;
2793  }
2794 
2795  assert (check->blocked_mode >= NULL_LOCK && res_ptr->total_holders_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
2796  compat = lock_Comp[check->blocked_mode][res_ptr->total_holders_mode];
2797  assert (compat != LOCK_COMPAT_UNKNOWN);
2798 
2799  if (compat == LOCK_COMPAT_NO)
2800  {
2801  assert (check->blocked_mode >= NULL_LOCK && mode >= NULL_LOCK);
2802  mode = lock_Conv[check->blocked_mode][mode];
2803  assert (mode != NA_LOCK);
2804 
2805  prev_check = check;
2806  check = check->next;
2807  continue;
2808  }
2809 
2810  /* compatible: grant it */
2811  thread_lock_entry (check->thrd_entry);
2812  if (LK_IS_LOCKWAIT_THREAD (check->thrd_entry))
2813  {
2814  int owner_tran_index;
2815 
2816  /* the thread is waiting on a lock */
2817  /* remove the lock entry from the waiter */
2818  if (prev_check == NULL)
2819  {
2820  res_ptr->waiter = check->next;
2821  }
2822  else
2823  {
2824  prev_check->next = check->next;
2825  }
2826 
2827  /* change granted_mode and blocked_mode of the entry */
2828  check->granted_mode = check->blocked_mode;
2829  check->blocked_mode = NULL_LOCK;
2830 
2831  /* position the lock entry into the holder list */
2832  lock_position_holder_entry (res_ptr, check);
2833 
2834  /* change total_holders_mode */
2835  assert (check->granted_mode >= NULL_LOCK && res_ptr->total_holders_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
2836  res_ptr->total_holders_mode = lock_Conv[check->granted_mode][res_ptr->total_holders_mode];
2837  assert (res_ptr->total_holders_mode != NA_LOCK);
2838 
2839  /* insert into transaction lock hold list */
2840  owner_tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (check->thrd_entry);
2841  lock_insert_into_tran_hold_list (check, owner_tran_index);
2842 
2843  /* reflect the granted lock in the non2pl list */
2844  lock_update_non2pl_list (thread_p, res_ptr, check->tran_index, check->granted_mode);
2845 
2846  /* Record number of acquired locks */
2847  perfmon_inc_stat (thread_p, PSTAT_LK_NUM_ACQUIRED_ON_OBJECTS);
2848 #if defined(LK_TRACE_OBJECT)
2849  LK_MSG_LOCK_ACQUIRED (entry_ptr);
2850 #endif /* LK_TRACE_OBJECT */
2851 
2852  /* wake up the blocked waiter (correctness must be checked) */
2853  lock_resume (check, LOCK_RESUMED);
2854  }
2855  else
2856  {
2857  if (check->thrd_entry->lockwait != NULL || check->thrd_entry->lockwait_state == (int) LOCK_SUSPENDED)
2858  {
2859  /* some strange lock wait state.. */
2860  er_set (ER_WARNING_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_STRANGE_LOCK_WAIT, 5, check->thrd_entry->lockwait,
2861  check->thrd_entry->lockwait_state, check->thrd_entry->index, check->thrd_entry->get_posix_id (),
2862  check->thrd_entry->tran_index);
2863  }
2864  /* The thread is not waiting on the lock. That is, the thread has already been waken up by lock timeout,
2865  * deadlock victim or interrupt. In this case, we have nothing to do since the thread itself will remove this
2866  * lock entry. */
2867  thread_unlock_entry (check->thrd_entry);
2868 
2869  /* change prev_check */
2870  assert (check->blocked_mode >= NULL_LOCK && mode >= NULL_LOCK);
2871  mode = lock_Conv[check->blocked_mode][mode];
2872  assert (mode != NA_LOCK);
2873 
2874  prev_check = check;
2875  }
2876 
2877  if (prev_check == NULL)
2878  {
2879  check = res_ptr->waiter;
2880  }
2881  else
2882  {
2883  check = prev_check->next;
2884  }
2885  }
2886 
2887  if (check == NULL)
2888  {
2889  res_ptr->total_waiters_mode = mode;
2890  }
2891  else
2892  {
2893  mode = NULL_LOCK;
2894  for (i = res_ptr->waiter; i != NULL; i = i->next)
2895  {
2896  assert (i->blocked_mode >= NULL_LOCK && mode >= NULL_LOCK);
2897  mode = lock_Conv[i->blocked_mode][mode];
2898  assert (mode != NA_LOCK);
2899  }
2900  res_ptr->total_waiters_mode = mode;
2901  }
2902 
2903 }
2904 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
2905 
2906 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
2907 /*
2908  * lock_check_escalate- check if lcok counts over escalation limits or not
2909  *
2910  * return: true if escalation is needed.
2911  * thread_p(in):
2912  * class_entry(in):
2913  * tran_lock(in):
2914  *
2915  */
2916 static bool
2917 lock_check_escalate (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, LK_ENTRY * class_entry, LK_TRAN_LOCK * tran_lock)
2918 {
2919  LK_ENTRY *superclass_entry = NULL;
2920 
2921  if (tran_lock->lock_escalation_on == true)
2922  {
2923  /* An another thread of current transaction is doing lock escalation. Therefore, the current thread gives up
2924  * doing lock escalation. */
2925  return false;
2926  }
2927 
2928  /* It cannot do lock escalation if class_entry is NULL */
2929  if (class_entry == NULL)
2930  {
2931  return false;
2932  }
2933 
2934  superclass_entry = class_entry->class_entry;
2935 
2936  /* check if the lock escalation is needed. */
2937  if (superclass_entry != NULL && !OID_IS_ROOTOID (&superclass_entry->res_head->key.oid))
2938  {
2939  /* Superclass_entry points to a root class in a class hierarchy. Escalate locks only if the criteria for the
2940  * superclass is met. Superclass keeps a counter for all locks set in the hierarchy. */
2941  if (superclass_entry->ngranules < prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_LK_ESCALATION_AT))
2942  {
2943  return false;
2944  }
2945  }
2946  else if (class_entry->ngranules < prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_LK_ESCALATION_AT))
2947  {
2948  return false;
2949  }
2950 
2951  return true;
2952 }
2953 
2954 
2955 /*
2956  * lock_escalate_if_needed -
2957  *
2958  * return: one of following values
2959  * LK_GRANTED
2960  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ABORTED
2961  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_TIMEOUT
2962  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR
2963  *
2964  * class_entry(in):
2965  * tran_index(in):
2966  *
2967  * Note:This function check if lock escalation is needed at first.
2968  * If lock escalation is needed, that is, an escalation threshold is over,
2969  * this function converts instance lock(s) to a class lock and
2970  * releases unnecessary instance locks.
2971  */
2972 static int
2973 lock_escalate_if_needed (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, LK_ENTRY * class_entry, int tran_index)
2974 {
2975  LK_TRAN_LOCK *tran_lock;
2976  LOCK max_class_lock = NULL_LOCK; /* escalated class lock mode */
2977  int granted;
2978  int wait_msecs;
2979  int rv;
2980 
2981  /* check lock escalation count */
2982  tran_lock = &lk_Gl.tran_lock_table[tran_index];
2983  rv = pthread_mutex_lock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
2984 
2985  if (lock_check_escalate (thread_p, class_entry, tran_lock) == false)
2986  {
2987  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
2988  return LK_NOTGRANTED;
2989  }
2990 
2991  /* abort lock escalation if lock_escalation_abort = yes */
2992  if (prm_get_bool_value (PRM_ID_LK_ROLLBACK_ON_LOCK_ESCALATION) == true)
2993  {
2994  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_ROLLBACK_ON_LOCK_ESCALATION, 1,
2995  prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_LK_ESCALATION_AT));
2996 
2997  lock_set_error_for_aborted (class_entry);
2998  lock_set_tran_abort_reason (class_entry->tran_index, TRAN_ABORT_DUE_ROLLBACK_ON_ESCALATION);
2999 
3000  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
3001  return LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ABORTED;
3002  }
3003 
3004  /* lock escalation should be performed */
3005  tran_lock->lock_escalation_on = true;
3006 
3007  if (class_entry->granted_mode == NULL_LOCK || class_entry->granted_mode == S_LOCK
3008  || class_entry->granted_mode == X_LOCK || class_entry->granted_mode == SCH_M_LOCK)
3009  {
3010  /* The class has no instance lock. */
3011  tran_lock->lock_escalation_on = false;
3012  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
3013  return LK_GRANTED;
3014  }
3015 
3016  /* class_entry->granted_mode : IS_LOCK, IX_LOCK or SIX_LOCK */
3017 
3018  /* Because to count the shared and exclusive instance locks may cause high CPU usage, we used a simple rule to decide
3019  * the escalated class lock mode */
3020  if (class_entry->granted_mode == IX_LOCK || class_entry->granted_mode == SIX_LOCK)
3021  {
3022  max_class_lock = X_LOCK;
3023  }
3024  else
3025  {
3026  max_class_lock = S_LOCK;
3027  }
3028 
3029  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
3030 
3031  if (max_class_lock != NULL_LOCK)
3032  {
3033  /*
3034  * lock escalation is performed
3035  * 1. hold a lock on the class with the escalated lock mode
3036  */
3037  wait_msecs = LK_FORCE_ZERO_WAIT; /* Conditional Locking */
3038  granted = lock_internal_perform_lock_object (thread_p, tran_index, &class_entry->res_head->key.oid, NULL,
3039  max_class_lock, wait_msecs, &class_entry, NULL);
3040  if (granted != LK_GRANTED)
3041  {
3042  /* The reason of the lock request failure: 1. interrupt 2. shortage of lock resource entries 3. shortage of
3043  * lock entries */
3044  /* reset lock_escalation_on */
3045  rv = pthread_mutex_lock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
3046  tran_lock->lock_escalation_on = false;
3047  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
3048  return granted;
3049  }
3050 
3051  /* 2. release original class lock only one time in order to maintain original class lock count */
3052  lock_internal_perform_unlock_object (thread_p, class_entry, false, true);
3053  }
3054 
3055  /* reset lock_escalation_on */
3056  rv = pthread_mutex_lock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
3057  tran_lock->lock_escalation_on = false;
3058  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
3059 
3060  return LK_GRANTED;
3061 }
3062 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
3063 
3064 /*
3065  * Private Functions Group: major functions for locking and unlocking
3066  *
3067  * - lk_internal_lock_object_instant()
3068  * - lk_internal_lock_object()
3069  * - lk_internal_unlock_object()
3070  */
3071 
3072 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
3073 /*
3074  * lock_internal_hold_lock_object_instant - Hold object lock with instant duration
3075  *
3076  * return: LK_GRANTED/LK_NOTGRANTED/LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR
3077  *
3078  * tran_index(in):
3079  * oid(in):
3080  * class_oid(in):
3081  * lock(in):
3082  *
3083  * Note:hold a lock on the given object with instant duration.
3084  */
3085 static int
3086 lock_internal_hold_lock_object_instant (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int tran_index, const OID * oid, const OID * class_oid,
3087  LOCK lock)
3088 {
3089  LF_TRAN_ENTRY *t_entry = thread_get_tran_entry (thread_p, THREAD_TS_OBJ_LOCK_RES);
3090  LK_RES_KEY search_key;
3091  LK_RES *res_ptr;
3092  LK_ENTRY *entry_ptr, *i;
3093  LOCK new_mode;
3094  LOCK group_mode;
3095  int rv;
3096  int compat1, compat2;
3097 
3098 #if defined(LK_DUMP)
3099  if (lk_Gl.dump_level >= 1)
3100  {
3101  fprintf (stderr,
3102  "LK_DUMP::lk_internal_lock_object_instant()\n"
3103  " tran(%2d) : oid(%2d|%3d|%3d), class_oid(%2d|%3d|%3d), LOCK(%7s)\n", tran_index, oid->volid,
3104  oid->pageid, oid->slotid, class_oid ? class_oid->volid : -1, class_oid ? class_oid->pageid : -1,
3105  class_oid ? class_oid->slotid : -1, LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (lock));
3106  }
3107 #endif /* LK_DUMP */
3108 
3109  if (class_oid != NULL && !OID_IS_ROOTOID (class_oid))
3110  {
3111  /* instance lock request */
3112  /* check if an implicit lock has been acquired */
3113  if (lock_is_class_lock_escalated (lock_get_object_lock (class_oid, oid_Root_class_oid, tran_index), lock) == true)
3114  {
3115  return LK_GRANTED;
3116  }
3117  }
3118 
3119  /* search hash table */
3120  search_key = lock_create_search_key ((OID *) oid, (OID *) class_oid);
3121  rv = lf_hash_find (t_entry, &lk_Gl.obj_hash_table, (void *) &search_key, (void **) &res_ptr);
3122  if (rv != NO_ERROR)
3123  {
3124  return rv;
3125  }
3126 
3127  if (res_ptr == NULL)
3128  {
3129  /* the lockable object is NOT in the hash chain */
3130  /* the request can be granted */
3131  return LK_GRANTED;
3132  }
3133 
3134  /* the lockable object exists in the hash chain */
3135  /* So, check whether I am a holder of the object. */
3136  /* find the lock entry of current transaction */
3137  for (entry_ptr = res_ptr->holder; entry_ptr != NULL; entry_ptr = entry_ptr->next)
3138  {
3139  if (entry_ptr->tran_index == tran_index)
3140  {
3141  break;
3142  }
3143  }
3144 
3145  /* I am not a lock holder of the lockable object. */
3146  if (entry_ptr == NULL)
3147  {
3148  assert (lock >= NULL_LOCK && res_ptr->total_waiters_mode >= NULL_LOCK
3149  && res_ptr->total_holders_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
3150 
3151  compat1 = lock_Comp[lock][res_ptr->total_waiters_mode];
3152  compat2 = lock_Comp[lock][res_ptr->total_holders_mode];
3153  assert (compat1 != LOCK_COMPAT_UNKNOWN && compat2 != LOCK_COMPAT_UNKNOWN);
3154 
3155  if (compat1 == LOCK_COMPAT_YES && compat2 == LOCK_COMPAT_YES)
3156  {
3157  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3158  return LK_GRANTED;
3159  }
3160  else
3161  {
3162  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3163  return LK_NOTGRANTED;
3164  }
3165  }
3166 
3167  /* I am a lock holder of the lockable object. */
3168  assert (lock >= NULL_LOCK && entry_ptr->granted_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
3169  new_mode = lock_Conv[lock][entry_ptr->granted_mode];
3170  assert (new_mode != NA_LOCK);
3171 
3172  if (new_mode == entry_ptr->granted_mode)
3173  {
3174  /* a request with either a less exclusive or an equal mode of lock */
3175  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3176  return LK_GRANTED;
3177  }
3178  else
3179  {
3180  /* check the compatibility with other holders' granted mode */
3181  group_mode = NULL_LOCK;
3182  for (i = res_ptr->holder; i != NULL; i = i->next)
3183  {
3184  if (i != entry_ptr)
3185  {
3186  assert (i->granted_mode >= NULL_LOCK && group_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
3187  group_mode = lock_Conv[i->granted_mode][group_mode];
3188  assert (group_mode != NA_LOCK);
3189  }
3190  }
3191 
3192  assert (new_mode >= NULL_LOCK && group_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
3193  compat1 = lock_Comp[new_mode][group_mode];
3194  assert (compat1 != LOCK_COMPAT_UNKNOWN);
3195 
3196  if (compat1 == LOCK_COMPAT_YES)
3197  {
3198  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3199  return LK_GRANTED;
3200  }
3201  else
3202  {
3203  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3204  return LK_NOTGRANTED;
3205  }
3206  }
3207 }
3208 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
3209 
3210 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
3211 /*
3212  * lock_internal_perform_lock_object - Performs actual object lock operation
3213  *
3214  * return: one of following values
3215  * LK_GRANTED
3216  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ABORTED
3217  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_TIMEOUT
3218  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR
3219  *
3220  * tran_index(in):
3221  * oid(in):
3222  * class_oid(in):
3223  * lock(in):
3224  * wait_msecs(in):
3225  * entry_addr_ptr(in):
3226  * class_entry(in):
3227  *
3228  * Note:lock an object whose id is pointed by oid with given lock mode 'lock'.
3229  *
3230  * If cond_flag is true and the object has already been locked
3231  * by other transaction, then return LK_NOTGRANTED;
3232  * else this transaction is suspended until it can acquire the lock.
3233  */
3234 static int
3235 lock_internal_perform_lock_object (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int tran_index, const OID * oid, const OID * class_oid,
3236  LOCK lock, int wait_msecs, LK_ENTRY ** entry_addr_ptr, LK_ENTRY * class_entry)
3237 {
3238  LF_TRAN_ENTRY *t_entry_res = thread_get_tran_entry (thread_p, THREAD_TS_OBJ_LOCK_RES);
3239  LF_TRAN_ENTRY *t_entry_ent = thread_get_tran_entry (thread_p, THREAD_TS_OBJ_LOCK_ENT);
3240  LK_RES_KEY search_key;
3241  TRAN_ISOLATION isolation;
3242  int ret_val;
3243  LOCK group_mode, old_mode, new_mode; /* lock mode */
3244  LK_RES *res_ptr;
3245  LK_ENTRY *entry_ptr = NULL;
3246  LK_ENTRY *wait_entry_ptr = NULL;
3247  LK_ENTRY *prev, *curr, *i;
3248  bool lock_conversion = false;
3249  THREAD_ENTRY *thrd_entry;
3250  int rv;
3251  LK_TRAN_LOCK *tran_lock;
3252  bool is_instant_duration;
3253  LOCK_COMPATIBILITY compat1, compat2;
3254  bool is_res_mutex_locked = false;
3255  TSC_TICKS start_tick, end_tick;
3256  TSCTIMEVAL tv_diff;
3257  UINT64 lock_wait_time;
3258 
3259 #if defined(ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP)
3260  const OID *class_oid_for_marker_p;
3261  const OID *oid_for_marker_p;
3262 #endif /* ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP */
3263 
3264  assert (!OID_ISNULL (oid));
3265  assert (class_oid == NULL || !OID_ISNULL (class_oid));
3266 
3267 #if defined(ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP)
3268  if (class_oid == NULL)
3269  {
3270  class_oid_for_marker_p = &oid_Null_oid;
3271  }
3272  else
3273  {
3274  class_oid_for_marker_p = class_oid;
3275  }
3276 
3277  if (oid == NULL)
3278  {
3279  oid_for_marker_p = &oid_Null_oid;
3280  }
3281  else
3282  {
3283  oid_for_marker_p = oid;
3284  }
3285 
3286  CUBRID_LOCK_ACQUIRE_START (oid_for_marker_p, class_oid_for_marker_p, lock);
3287 #endif /* ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP */
3288 
3289  if (thread_p == NULL)
3290  {
3291  thread_p = thread_get_thread_entry_info ();
3292  }
3293 
3294  thrd_entry = thread_p;
3295 
3296  new_mode = group_mode = old_mode = NULL_LOCK;
3297 #if defined(LK_DUMP)
3298  if (lk_Gl.dump_level >= 1)
3299  {
3300  fprintf (stderr,
3301  "LK_DUMP::lk_internal_lock_object()\n"
3302  " tran(%2d) : oid(%2d|%3d|%3d), class_oid(%2d|%3d|%3d), LOCK(%7s) wait_msecs(%d)\n", tran_index,
3303  oid->volid, oid->pageid, oid->slotid, class_oid ? class_oid->volid : -1,
3304  class_oid ? class_oid->pageid : -1, class_oid ? class_oid->slotid : -1, LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (lock),
3305  wait_msecs);
3306  }
3307 #endif /* LK_DUMP */
3308 
3309  /* isolation */
3310  isolation = logtb_find_isolation (tran_index);
3311 
3312  /* initialize */
3313  *entry_addr_ptr = NULL;
3314 
3315  /* get current locking phase */
3316  tran_lock = &lk_Gl.tran_lock_table[tran_index];
3317  is_instant_duration = tran_lock->is_instant_duration;
3318 
3319 start:
3320  assert (!is_res_mutex_locked);
3321 
3322  if (class_oid != NULL && !OID_IS_ROOTOID (class_oid))
3323  {
3324  /* instance lock request */
3325 
3326  /* do lock escalation if it is needed and check if an implicit lock has been acquired. */
3327  ret_val = lock_escalate_if_needed (thread_p, class_entry, tran_index);
3328  if (ret_val == LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ABORTED)
3329  {
3330  LOG_TDES *tdes = LOG_FIND_TDES (tran_index);
3331  if (tdes && tdes->tran_abort_reason == TRAN_ABORT_DUE_ROLLBACK_ON_ESCALATION)
3332  {
3333  goto end;
3334  }
3335  }
3336 
3337  if (ret_val == LK_GRANTED
3338  && lock_is_class_lock_escalated (lock_get_object_lock (class_oid, oid_Root_class_oid, tran_index),
3339  lock) == true)
3340  {
3341  perfmon_inc_stat (thread_p, PSTAT_LK_NUM_RE_REQUESTED_ON_OBJECTS); /* monitoring */
3342  ret_val = LK_GRANTED;
3343  goto end;
3344  }
3345  }
3346  else
3347  {
3348  /* Class lock request. */
3349  /* Try to find class lock entry if it already exists to avoid using the expensive resource mutex. */
3350  entry_ptr = lock_find_class_entry (tran_index, oid);
3351  if (entry_ptr != NULL)
3352  {
3353  res_ptr = entry_ptr->res_head;
3354  goto lock_tran_lk_entry;
3355  }
3356  }
3357 
3358  /* find or add the lockable object in the lock table */
3359  search_key = lock_create_search_key ((OID *) oid, (OID *) class_oid);
3360  rv = lf_hash_find_or_insert (t_entry_res, &lk_Gl.obj_hash_table, (void *) &search_key, (void **) &res_ptr, NULL);
3361  if (rv != NO_ERROR)
3362  {
3363  return rv;
3364  }
3365  else if (res_ptr == NULL)
3366  {
3367  return ER_FAILED;
3368  }
3369  /* Find or insert also locks the resource mutex. */
3370  is_res_mutex_locked = true;
3371 
3372  if (res_ptr->holder == NULL && res_ptr->waiter == NULL && res_ptr->non2pl == NULL)
3373  {
3374  /* the lockable object was NOT in the hash chain */
3375  /* the lock request can be granted. */
3376 
3377  /* initialize the lock resource entry */
3378  lock_initialize_resource_as_allocated (res_ptr, NULL_LOCK);
3379 
3380  entry_ptr = lock_get_new_entry (tran_index, t_entry_ent, &lk_Gl.obj_free_entry_list);
3381  if (entry_ptr == NULL)
3382  {
3383  assert (is_res_mutex_locked);
3384  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3385  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_ALLOC_RESOURCE, 1, "lock heap entry");
3386  ret_val = LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
3387  goto end;
3388  }
3389 
3390  /* initialize the lock entry as granted state */
3391  lock_initialize_entry_as_granted (entry_ptr, tran_index, res_ptr, lock);
3392  if (is_instant_duration)
3393  {
3394  entry_ptr->instant_lock_count++;
3395  assert (entry_ptr->instant_lock_count > 0);
3396  }
3397 
3398  /* add the lock entry into the holder list */
3399  res_ptr->holder = entry_ptr;
3400 
3401  /* to manage granules */
3402  entry_ptr->class_entry = class_entry;
3403  lock_increment_class_granules (class_entry);
3404 
3405  /* add the lock entry into the transaction hold list */
3406  lock_insert_into_tran_hold_list (entry_ptr, tran_index);
3407 
3408  res_ptr->total_holders_mode = lock;
3409 
3410  /* Record number of acquired locks */
3411  perfmon_inc_stat (thread_p, PSTAT_LK_NUM_ACQUIRED_ON_OBJECTS);
3412 #if defined(LK_TRACE_OBJECT)
3413  LK_MSG_LOCK_ACQUIRED (entry_ptr);
3414 #endif /* LK_TRACE_OBJECT */
3415 
3416  /* release all mutexes */
3417  assert (is_res_mutex_locked);
3418  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3419 
3420  *entry_addr_ptr = entry_ptr;
3421 
3422  ret_val = LK_GRANTED;
3423  goto end;
3424  }
3425 
3426  /* the lockable object existed in the hash chain So, check whether I am a holder of the object. */
3427 
3428  /* find the lock entry of current transaction */
3429  entry_ptr = res_ptr->holder;
3430  while (entry_ptr != NULL)
3431  {
3432  if (entry_ptr->tran_index == tran_index)
3433  {
3434  break;
3435  }
3436  entry_ptr = entry_ptr->next;
3437  }
3438 
3439  if (entry_ptr == NULL)
3440  {
3441  /* The object exists in the hash chain & I am not a lock holder of the lockable object. */
3442 
3443  /* 1. I am not a holder & my request can be granted. */
3444  assert (lock >= NULL_LOCK && res_ptr->total_waiters_mode >= NULL_LOCK
3445  && res_ptr->total_holders_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
3446  compat1 = lock_Comp[lock][res_ptr->total_waiters_mode];
3447  compat2 = lock_Comp[lock][res_ptr->total_holders_mode];
3448  assert (compat1 != LOCK_COMPAT_UNKNOWN && compat2 != LOCK_COMPAT_UNKNOWN);
3449 
3450  if (compat1 == LOCK_COMPAT_YES && compat2 == LOCK_COMPAT_YES)
3451  {
3452  entry_ptr = lock_get_new_entry (tran_index, t_entry_ent, &lk_Gl.obj_free_entry_list);
3453  if (entry_ptr == NULL)
3454  {
3455  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3456  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_ALLOC_RESOURCE, 1, "lock heap entry");
3457 
3458  ret_val = LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
3459  goto end;
3460  }
3461 
3462  /* initialize the lock entry as granted state */
3463  lock_initialize_entry_as_granted (entry_ptr, tran_index, res_ptr, lock);
3464  if (is_instant_duration)
3465  {
3466  entry_ptr->instant_lock_count++;
3467  assert (entry_ptr->instant_lock_count > 0);
3468  }
3469 
3470  /* to manage granules */
3471  entry_ptr->class_entry = class_entry;
3472  lock_increment_class_granules (class_entry);
3473 
3474  /* add the lock entry into the holder list */
3475  lock_position_holder_entry (res_ptr, entry_ptr);
3476 
3477  /* change total_holders_mode (total mode of holder list) */
3478  assert (lock >= NULL_LOCK && res_ptr->total_holders_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
3479  res_ptr->total_holders_mode = lock_Conv[lock][res_ptr->total_holders_mode];
3480  assert (res_ptr->total_holders_mode != NA_LOCK);
3481 
3482  /* add the lock entry into the transaction hold list */
3483  lock_insert_into_tran_hold_list (entry_ptr, tran_index);
3484 
3485  lock_update_non2pl_list (thread_p, res_ptr, tran_index, lock);
3486 
3487  /* Record number of acquired locks */
3488  perfmon_inc_stat (thread_p, PSTAT_LK_NUM_ACQUIRED_ON_OBJECTS);
3489 #if defined(LK_TRACE_OBJECT)
3490  LK_MSG_LOCK_ACQUIRED (entry_ptr);
3491 #endif /* LK_TRACE_OBJECT */
3492 
3493  assert (is_res_mutex_locked);
3494  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3495  *entry_addr_ptr = entry_ptr;
3496 
3497  ret_val = LK_GRANTED;
3498  goto end;
3499  }
3500 
3501  /* 2. I am not a holder & my request cannot be granted. */
3502  if (wait_msecs == LK_ZERO_WAIT || wait_msecs == LK_FORCE_ZERO_WAIT)
3503  {
3504  assert (is_res_mutex_locked);
3505  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3506  if (wait_msecs == LK_ZERO_WAIT)
3507  {
3508  if (entry_ptr == NULL)
3509  {
3510  entry_ptr = lock_get_new_entry (tran_index, t_entry_ent, &lk_Gl.obj_free_entry_list);
3511  if (entry_ptr == NULL)
3512  {
3513  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_ALLOC_RESOURCE, 1, "lock heap entry");
3514  ret_val = LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
3515  goto end;
3516  }
3517  lock_initialize_entry_as_blocked (entry_ptr, thread_p, tran_index, res_ptr, lock);
3518  if (is_instant_duration
3519  /* && lock_Comp[lock][NULL_LOCK] == true */ )
3520  {
3521  entry_ptr->instant_lock_count++;
3522  assert (entry_ptr->instant_lock_count > 0);
3523  }
3524  }
3525  (void) lock_set_error_for_timeout (thread_p, entry_ptr);
3526 
3527  lock_free_entry (tran_index, t_entry_ent, &lk_Gl.obj_free_entry_list, entry_ptr);
3528  }
3529 
3530  ret_val = LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_TIMEOUT;
3531  goto end;
3532  }
3533 
3534  /* check if another thread is waiting for the same resource */
3535  wait_entry_ptr = res_ptr->waiter;
3536  while (wait_entry_ptr != NULL)
3537  {
3538  if (wait_entry_ptr->tran_index == tran_index)
3539  {
3540  break;
3541  }
3542  wait_entry_ptr = wait_entry_ptr->next;
3543  }
3544 
3545  if (wait_entry_ptr != NULL)
3546  {
3547  er_set (ER_WARNING_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_MANY_LOCK_WAIT_TRAN, 1, tran_index);
3548  thread_lock_entry (thrd_entry);
3549  thread_lock_entry (wait_entry_ptr->thrd_entry);
3550  if (wait_entry_ptr->thrd_entry->lockwait == NULL)
3551  {
3552  /* */
3553  thread_unlock_entry (wait_entry_ptr->thrd_entry);
3554  thread_unlock_entry (thrd_entry);
3555  assert (is_res_mutex_locked);
3556  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3557  is_res_mutex_locked = false;
3558  goto start;
3559  }
3560 
3561  thrd_entry->tran_next_wait = wait_entry_ptr->thrd_entry->tran_next_wait;
3562  wait_entry_ptr->thrd_entry->tran_next_wait = thrd_entry;
3563 
3564  thread_unlock_entry (wait_entry_ptr->thrd_entry);
3565  assert (is_res_mutex_locked);
3566  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3567  is_res_mutex_locked = false;
3568 
3569  thread_suspend_wakeup_and_unlock_entry (thrd_entry, THREAD_LOCK_SUSPENDED);
3570  if (entry_ptr)
3571  {
3572  if (entry_ptr->thrd_entry->resume_status == THREAD_RESUME_DUE_TO_INTERRUPT)
3573  {
3574  /* a shutdown thread wakes me up */
3575  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_INTERRUPTED, 0);
3576 
3577  ret_val = LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
3578  goto end;
3579  }
3580  else if (entry_ptr->thrd_entry->resume_status != THREAD_LOCK_RESUMED)
3581  {
3582  /* wake up with other reason */
3583  assert (0);
3584 
3585  if (er_errid () == NO_ERROR)
3586  {
3587  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_INTERRUPTED, 0);
3588  }
3589  ret_val = LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
3590  goto end;
3591  }
3592  else
3593  {
3594  assert (entry_ptr->thrd_entry->resume_status == THREAD_LOCK_RESUMED);
3595  }
3596  }
3597 
3598  goto start;
3599  }
3600 
3601  /* allocate a lock entry. */
3602  entry_ptr = lock_get_new_entry (tran_index, t_entry_ent, &lk_Gl.obj_free_entry_list);
3603  if (entry_ptr == NULL)
3604  {
3605  assert (is_res_mutex_locked);
3606  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3607  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_ALLOC_RESOURCE, 1, "lock heap entry");
3608  ret_val = LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
3609  goto end;
3610  }
3611  /* initialize the lock entry as blocked state */
3612  lock_initialize_entry_as_blocked (entry_ptr, thread_p, tran_index, res_ptr, lock);
3613  if (is_instant_duration)
3614  {
3615  entry_ptr->instant_lock_count++;
3616  assert (entry_ptr->instant_lock_count > 0);
3617  }
3618 
3619  /* append the lock request at the end of the waiter */
3620  prev = NULL;
3621  for (i = res_ptr->waiter; i != NULL; i = i->next)
3622  {
3623  prev = i;
3624  }
3625  if (prev == NULL)
3626  {
3627  res_ptr->waiter = entry_ptr;
3628  }
3629  else
3630  {
3631  prev->next = entry_ptr;
3632  }
3633 
3634  /* change total_waiters_mode (total mode of waiting waiter) */
3635  assert (lock >= NULL_LOCK && res_ptr->total_waiters_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
3636  res_ptr->total_waiters_mode = lock_Conv[lock][res_ptr->total_waiters_mode];
3637  assert (res_ptr->total_waiters_mode != NA_LOCK);
3638 
3639  goto blocked;
3640  } /* end of a new lock request */
3641 
3642 lock_tran_lk_entry:
3643  /* The object exists in the hash chain & I am a lock holder of the lockable object. */
3644  lock_conversion = true;
3645  old_mode = entry_ptr->granted_mode;
3646  assert (lock >= NULL_LOCK && entry_ptr->granted_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
3647  new_mode = lock_Conv[lock][entry_ptr->granted_mode];
3648  assert (new_mode != NA_LOCK);
3649 
3650  if (new_mode == entry_ptr->granted_mode)
3651  {
3652  /* a request with either a less exclusive or an equal mode of lock */
3653  entry_ptr->count += 1;
3654  if (is_instant_duration)
3655  {
3656  compat1 = lock_Comp[lock][entry_ptr->granted_mode];
3657  assert (compat1 != LOCK_COMPAT_UNKNOWN);
3658 
3659  if ((lock >= IX_LOCK && (entry_ptr->instant_lock_count == 0 && entry_ptr->granted_mode >= IX_LOCK))
3660  && compat1 != LOCK_COMPAT_YES)
3661  {
3662  /* if the lock is already acquired with incompatible mode by current transaction, remove instant instance
3663  * locks */
3664  lock_stop_instant_lock_mode (thread_p, tran_index, false);
3665  }
3666  else
3667  {
3668  entry_ptr->instant_lock_count++;
3669  assert (entry_ptr->instant_lock_count > 0);
3670  }
3671  }
3672 
3673  if (is_res_mutex_locked)
3674  {
3675  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3676  }
3677  perfmon_inc_stat (thread_p, PSTAT_LK_NUM_RE_REQUESTED_ON_OBJECTS); /* monitoring */
3678  *entry_addr_ptr = entry_ptr;
3679 
3680  ret_val = LK_GRANTED;
3681  goto end;
3682  }
3683 
3684  if (!is_res_mutex_locked)
3685  {
3686  /* We need to lock resource mutex. */
3687  pthread_mutex_lock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3688  is_res_mutex_locked = true;
3689  }
3690 
3691  /* check the compatibility with other holders' granted mode */
3692  group_mode = NULL_LOCK;
3693  for (i = res_ptr->holder; i != NULL; i = i->next)
3694  {
3695  if (i != entry_ptr)
3696  {
3697  assert (i->granted_mode >= NULL_LOCK && group_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
3698  group_mode = lock_Conv[i->granted_mode][group_mode];
3699  assert (group_mode != NA_LOCK);
3700  }
3701  }
3702 
3703  assert (new_mode >= NULL_LOCK && group_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
3704  compat1 = lock_Comp[new_mode][group_mode];
3705  assert (compat1 != LOCK_COMPAT_UNKNOWN);
3706 
3707  if (compat1 == LOCK_COMPAT_YES)
3708  {
3709  entry_ptr->granted_mode = new_mode;
3710  entry_ptr->count += 1;
3711  if (is_instant_duration)
3712  {
3713  entry_ptr->instant_lock_count++;
3714  assert (entry_ptr->instant_lock_count > 0);
3715  }
3716 
3717  assert (lock >= NULL_LOCK && res_ptr->total_holders_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
3718  res_ptr->total_holders_mode = lock_Conv[lock][res_ptr->total_holders_mode];
3719  assert (res_ptr->total_holders_mode != NA_LOCK);
3720 
3721  lock_update_non2pl_list (thread_p, res_ptr, tran_index, lock);
3722  assert (is_res_mutex_locked);
3723  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3724 
3725  goto lock_conversion_treatement;
3726  }
3727 
3728  /* I am a holder & my request cannot be granted. */
3729  if (wait_msecs == LK_ZERO_WAIT || wait_msecs == LK_FORCE_ZERO_WAIT)
3730  {
3731  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3732  if (wait_msecs == LK_ZERO_WAIT)
3733  {
3734  LK_ENTRY *p = lock_get_new_entry (tran_index, t_entry_ent,
3735  &lk_Gl.obj_free_entry_list);
3736 
3737  if (p != NULL)
3738  {
3739  lock_initialize_entry_as_blocked (p, thread_p, tran_index, res_ptr, lock);
3740  lock_set_error_for_timeout (thread_p, p);
3741  lock_free_entry (tran_index, t_entry_ent, &lk_Gl.obj_free_entry_list, p);
3742  }
3743  }
3744 
3745  ret_val = LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_TIMEOUT;
3746  goto end;
3747  }
3748 
3749  /* Upgrader Positioning Rule (UPR) */
3750 
3751  /* check if another thread is waiting for the same resource */
3752  if (entry_ptr->blocked_mode != NULL_LOCK)
3753  {
3754  er_set (ER_WARNING_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_MANY_LOCK_WAIT_TRAN, 1, tran_index);
3755  thread_lock_entry (thrd_entry);
3756  thread_lock_entry (entry_ptr->thrd_entry);
3757 
3758  if (entry_ptr->thrd_entry->lockwait == NULL)
3759  {
3760  thread_unlock_entry (entry_ptr->thrd_entry);
3761  thread_unlock_entry (thrd_entry);
3762  assert (is_res_mutex_locked);
3763  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3764  is_res_mutex_locked = false;
3765  goto start;
3766  }
3767 
3768  thrd_entry->tran_next_wait = entry_ptr->thrd_entry->tran_next_wait;
3769  entry_ptr->thrd_entry->tran_next_wait = thrd_entry;
3770 
3771  thread_unlock_entry (entry_ptr->thrd_entry);
3772 
3773  assert (is_res_mutex_locked);
3774  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3775  is_res_mutex_locked = false;
3776 
3777  thread_suspend_wakeup_and_unlock_entry (thrd_entry, THREAD_LOCK_SUSPENDED);
3778  if (thrd_entry->resume_status == THREAD_RESUME_DUE_TO_INTERRUPT)
3779  {
3780  /* a shutdown thread wakes me up */
3781  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_INTERRUPTED, 0);
3782  ret_val = LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
3783  goto end;
3784  }
3785  else if (thrd_entry->resume_status != THREAD_LOCK_RESUMED)
3786  {
3787  /* wake up with other reason */
3788  assert (0);
3789 
3790  if (er_errid () == NO_ERROR)
3791  {
3792  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_INTERRUPTED, 0);
3793  }
3794  ret_val = LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
3795  goto end;
3796  }
3797  else
3798  {
3799  assert (thrd_entry->resume_status == THREAD_LOCK_RESUMED);
3800  }
3801 
3802  goto start;
3803  }
3804 
3805  entry_ptr->blocked_mode = new_mode;
3806  entry_ptr->count += 1;
3807  if (is_instant_duration)
3808  {
3809  entry_ptr->instant_lock_count++;
3810  assert (entry_ptr->instant_lock_count > 0);
3811  }
3812 
3813  entry_ptr->thrd_entry = thread_p;
3814 
3815  assert (lock >= NULL_LOCK && res_ptr->total_holders_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
3816  res_ptr->total_holders_mode = lock_Conv[lock][res_ptr->total_holders_mode];
3817  assert (res_ptr->total_holders_mode != NA_LOCK);
3818 
3819  /* remove the lock entry from the holder list */
3820  prev = NULL;
3821  curr = res_ptr->holder;
3822  while ((curr != NULL) && (curr != entry_ptr))
3823  {
3824  prev = curr;
3825  curr = curr->next;
3826  }
3827  if (prev == NULL)
3828  {
3829  res_ptr->holder = entry_ptr->next;
3830  }
3831  else
3832  {
3833  prev->next = entry_ptr->next;
3834  }
3835 
3836  /* position the lock entry in the holder list according to UPR */
3837  lock_position_holder_entry (res_ptr, entry_ptr);
3838 
3839 blocked:
3840 
3841  if (perfmon_is_perf_tracking_and_active (PERFMON_ACTIVATION_FLAG_LOCK_OBJECT))
3842  {
3843  tsc_getticks (&start_tick);
3844  }
3845 
3846  /* LK_CANWAIT(wait_msecs) : wait_msecs > 0 */
3847  perfmon_inc_stat (thread_p, PSTAT_LK_NUM_WAITED_ON_OBJECTS);
3848 #if defined(LK_TRACE_OBJECT)
3849  LK_MSG_LOCK_WAITFOR (entry_ptr);
3850 #endif /* LK_TRACE_OBJECT */
3851 
3852  thread_lock_entry (entry_ptr->thrd_entry);
3853  if (is_res_mutex_locked)
3854  {
3855  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
3856  }
3857  ret_val = lock_suspend (thread_p, entry_ptr, wait_msecs);
3858 
3859  if (perfmon_is_perf_tracking_and_active (PERFMON_ACTIVATION_FLAG_LOCK_OBJECT))
3860  {
3861  tsc_getticks (&end_tick);
3862  tsc_elapsed_time_usec (&tv_diff, end_tick, start_tick);
3863  lock_wait_time = tv_diff.tv_sec * 1000000LL + tv_diff.tv_usec;
3864  perfmon_lk_waited_time_on_objects (thread_p, lock, lock_wait_time);
3865  }
3866 
3867  if (ret_val != LOCK_RESUMED)
3868  {
3869  /* Following three cases are possible. 1. lock timeout 2. deadlock victim 3. interrupt In any case, current
3870  * thread must remove the wait info. */
3871  lock_internal_perform_unlock_object (thread_p, entry_ptr, false, false);
3872 
3873  if (ret_val == LOCK_RESUMED_ABORTED)
3874  {
3875  ret_val = LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ABORTED;
3876  goto end;
3877  }
3878  else if (ret_val == LOCK_RESUMED_INTERRUPT)
3879  {
3880  ret_val = LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
3881  goto end;
3882  }
3883  else /* LOCK_RESUMED_TIMEOUT || LOCK_SUSPENDED */
3884  {
3885  ret_val = LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_TIMEOUT;
3886  goto end;
3887  }
3888  }
3889 
3890  /* The transaction now got the lock on the object */
3891 lock_conversion_treatement:
3892 
3893  if (entry_ptr->res_head->key.type == LOCK_RESOURCE_CLASS && lock_conversion == true)
3894  {
3895  new_mode = entry_ptr->granted_mode;
3896  switch (old_mode)
3897  {
3898  case IS_LOCK:
3899  if (IS_WRITE_EXCLUSIVE_LOCK (new_mode) || new_mode == S_LOCK || new_mode == SIX_LOCK)
3900  {
3901  lock_remove_all_inst_locks (thread_p, tran_index, oid, S_LOCK);
3902  }
3903  break;
3904 
3905  case IX_LOCK:
3906  if (new_mode == SIX_LOCK)
3907  {
3908  lock_remove_all_inst_locks (thread_p, tran_index, oid, S_LOCK);
3909  }
3910  else if (IS_WRITE_EXCLUSIVE_LOCK (new_mode))
3911  {
3912  lock_remove_all_inst_locks (thread_p, tran_index, oid, X_LOCK);
3913  }
3914  break;
3915 
3916  case SIX_LOCK:
3917  /* new_mode == X_LOCK */
3918  lock_remove_all_inst_locks (thread_p, tran_index, oid, X_LOCK);
3919  break;
3920 
3921  default:
3922  break;
3923  }
3924 
3925  perfmon_inc_stat (thread_p, PSTAT_LK_NUM_CONVERTED_ON_OBJECTS);
3926 #if defined(LK_TRACE_OBJECT)
3927  LK_MSG_LOCK_CONVERTED (entry_ptr);
3928 #endif /* LK_TRACE_OBJECT */
3929  }
3930 
3931  if (lock_conversion == false)
3932  {
3933  /* to manage granules */
3934  entry_ptr->class_entry = class_entry;
3935  lock_increment_class_granules (class_entry);
3936  }
3937 
3938  *entry_addr_ptr = entry_ptr;
3939  ret_val = LK_GRANTED;
3940 
3941 end:
3942 #if defined(ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP)
3943  CUBRID_LOCK_ACQUIRE_END (oid_for_marker_p, class_oid_for_marker_p, lock, ret_val != LK_GRANTED);
3944 #endif /* ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP */
3945 
3946  return ret_val;
3947 }
3948 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
3949 
3950 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
3951 /*
3952  * lock_internal_perform_unlock_object - Performs actual object unlock operation
3953  *
3954  * return:
3955  *
3956  * entry_ptr(in):
3957  * release_flag(in):
3958  * move_to_non2pl(in):
3959  *
3960  * Note:Unlock a lock specified by entry_ptr.
3961  * Therefore, for the 2 phase locking, the caller must unlock from leaf
3962  * to root or atomically all locks to which the transaction is related.
3963  *
3964  * if release_flag is true, release the lock item.
3965  * Otherwise, just decrement the lock count for supporting isolation level.
3966  */
3967 static void
3968 lock_internal_perform_unlock_object (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, LK_ENTRY * entry_ptr, bool release_flag,
3969  bool move_to_non2pl)
3970 {
3971  LF_TRAN_ENTRY *t_entry = thread_get_tran_entry (thread_p, THREAD_TS_OBJ_LOCK_ENT);
3972  int tran_index;
3973  LK_RES *res_ptr;
3974  LK_ENTRY *i;
3975  LK_ENTRY *prev, *curr;
3976  LK_ENTRY *from_whom;
3977  LOCK mode;
3978  int rv;
3979 
3980 #if defined(LK_DUMP)
3981  if (lk_Gl.dump_level >= 1)
3982  {
3983  fprintf (stderr,
3984  "LK_DUMP::lk_internal_unlock_object()\n"
3985  " tran(%2d) : oid(%2d|%3d|%3d), class_oid(%2d|%3d|%3d), LOCK(%7s)\n", entry_ptr->tran_index,
3986  entry_ptr->res_head->oid.volid, entry_ptr->res_head->oid.pageid, entry_ptr->res_head->oid.slotid,
3987  entry_ptr->res_head->class_oid.volid, entry_ptr->res_head->class_oid.pageid,
3988  entry_ptr->res_head->class_oid.slotid, LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (entry_ptr->granted_mode));
3989  }
3990 #endif /* LK_DUMP */
3991 
3992  if (entry_ptr == NULL)
3993  {
3994  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lk_internal_unlock_object",
3995  "NULL entry pointer");
3996  return;
3997  }
3998 
3999  tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p);
4000  if (entry_ptr->tran_index != tran_index)
4001  {
4002  assert (false);
4003  return;
4004  }
4005 
4006  if (release_flag == false)
4007  {
4008  entry_ptr->count--;
4009  if (lock_is_instant_lock_mode (tran_index))
4010  {
4011  entry_ptr->instant_lock_count--;
4012  assert (entry_ptr->instant_lock_count >= 0);
4013  }
4014 
4015  if (entry_ptr->blocked_mode == NULL_LOCK && entry_ptr->count > 0)
4016  {
4017  return;
4018  }
4019  }
4020 
4021  /* hold resource mutex */
4022  res_ptr = entry_ptr->res_head;
4023  rv = pthread_mutex_lock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
4024 
4025  /* check if the transaction is in the holder list */
4026  prev = NULL;
4027  curr = res_ptr->holder;
4028  while (curr != NULL)
4029  {
4030  if (curr->tran_index == tran_index)
4031  {
4032  break;
4033  }
4034  prev = curr;
4035  curr = curr->next;
4036  }
4037 
4038  if (curr == NULL)
4039  {
4040  /* the transaction is not in the holder list, check the waiter. */
4041  prev = NULL;
4042  curr = res_ptr->waiter;
4043  while (curr != NULL)
4044  {
4045  if (curr->tran_index == tran_index)
4046  {
4047  break;
4048  }
4049  prev = curr;
4050  curr = curr->next;
4051  }
4052 
4053  if (curr != NULL)
4054  {
4055  /* get the next lock waiter */
4056  from_whom = curr->next;
4057 
4058  /* remove the lock entry from the waiter */
4059  if (prev == NULL)
4060  {
4061  res_ptr->waiter = curr->next;
4062  }
4063  else
4064  {
4065  prev->next = curr->next;
4066  }
4067 
4068  /* free the lock entry */
4069  lock_free_entry (tran_index, t_entry, &lk_Gl.obj_free_entry_list, curr);
4070 
4071  if (from_whom != NULL)
4072  {
4073  /* grant blocked waiter & change total_waiters_mode */
4074  lock_grant_blocked_waiter_partial (thread_p, res_ptr, from_whom);
4075  }
4076  else
4077  {
4078  /* change only total_waiters_mode */
4079  mode = NULL_LOCK;
4080  for (i = res_ptr->waiter; i != NULL; i = i->next)
4081  {
4082  assert (i->blocked_mode >= NULL_LOCK && mode >= NULL_LOCK);
4083  mode = lock_Conv[i->blocked_mode][mode];
4084  assert (mode != NA_LOCK);
4085  }
4086  res_ptr->total_waiters_mode = mode;
4087  }
4088  }
4089  else
4090  {
4091  assert (false);
4092  /* The transaction is neither the lock holder nor the lock waiter */
4093  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_LOST_TRANSACTION, 4, tran_index, res_ptr->key.oid.volid,
4094  res_ptr->key.oid.pageid, res_ptr->key.oid.slotid);
4095  }
4096 
4097  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
4098 
4099  return;
4100  }
4101 
4102  /* The transaction is in the holder list. Consult the holder list. */
4103 
4104  /* remove the entry from the holder list */
4105  if (prev == NULL)
4106  {
4107  res_ptr->holder = curr->next;
4108  }
4109  else
4110  {
4111  prev->next = curr->next;
4112  }
4113 
4114  if (release_flag == false && curr->count > 0)
4115  {
4116  /* The current transaction was a blocked holder. lock timeout is called or it is selected as a deadlock victim */
4117  curr->blocked_mode = NULL_LOCK;
4118  lock_position_holder_entry (res_ptr, entry_ptr);
4119  }
4120  else
4121  {
4122  /* remove the lock entry from the transaction lock hold list */
4123  (void) lock_delete_from_tran_hold_list (curr, tran_index);
4124 
4125  /* to manage granules */
4126  lock_decrement_class_granules (curr->class_entry);
4127 
4128  /* If it's not the end of transaction, it's a non2pl lock */
4129  if (release_flag == false && move_to_non2pl == true)
4130  {
4131  (void) lock_add_non2pl_lock (thread_p, res_ptr, tran_index, curr->granted_mode);
4132  }
4133  /* free the lock entry */
4134  lock_free_entry (tran_index, t_entry, &lk_Gl.obj_free_entry_list, curr);
4135  }
4136 
4137  /* change total_holders_mode */
4138  mode = NULL_LOCK;
4139  for (i = res_ptr->holder; i != NULL; i = i->next)
4140  {
4141  assert (i->granted_mode >= NULL_LOCK && mode >= NULL_LOCK);
4142  mode = lock_Conv[i->granted_mode][mode];
4143  assert (mode != NA_LOCK);
4144 
4145  assert (i->blocked_mode >= NULL_LOCK && mode >= NULL_LOCK);
4146  mode = lock_Conv[i->blocked_mode][mode];
4147  assert (mode != NA_LOCK);
4148  }
4149  res_ptr->total_holders_mode = mode;
4150 
4151  if (res_ptr->holder == NULL && res_ptr->waiter == NULL)
4152  {
4153  if (res_ptr->non2pl == NULL)
4154  {
4155  /* if resource entry is empty, remove it. */
4156  (void) lock_remove_resource (thread_p, res_ptr);
4157  }
4158  else
4159  {
4160  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
4161  }
4162  }
4163  else
4164  {
4165  /* grant blocked holders and blocked waiters */
4166  lock_grant_blocked_holder (thread_p, res_ptr);
4167 
4168  (void) lock_grant_blocked_waiter (thread_p, res_ptr);
4169  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
4170  }
4171 }
4172 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
4173 
4174 /*
4175  * lock_demote_class_lock - Demote the class lock to to_be_lock
4176  *
4177  * return: error code
4178  * oid(in): class oid
4179  * lock(in): lock mode to be set
4180  * ex_lock(out): ex-lock mode
4181  *
4182  * Note: This function demotes the lock mode of given class lock.
4183  * After the demotion, this function grants the blocked requestors if the blocked lock mode is grantable.
4184  *
4185  * WARNING: Demoting a write lock in the middle of a transaction may cause recovery issues.
4186  * It should be carefully used for some particular cases.
4187  * Since I don't see any usage of an instance lock and it is very DANGEROUS,
4188  * the current function only supports demotion of a class lock.
4189  */
4190 int
4191 lock_demote_class_lock (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, const OID * oid, LOCK lock, LOCK * ex_lock)
4192 {
4193 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
4194  LK_ENTRY *entry_ptr;
4195  int tran_index;
4196 
4197  tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p);
4198 
4199  entry_ptr = lock_find_tran_hold_entry (thread_p, tran_index, oid, true);
4200  if (entry_ptr == NULL)
4201  {
4202  assert (entry_ptr != NULL);
4203  return ER_FAILED;
4204  }
4205 
4206  return lock_internal_demote_class_lock (thread_p, entry_ptr, lock, ex_lock);
4207 #else // SERVER_MODE
4208  return NO_ERROR;
4209 #endif // !SERVER_MODE = SA_MODE
4210 }
4211 
4212 #if defined (SERVER_MODE)
4213 /*
4214  * lock_internal_demote_class_lock - helper function to lock_demote_class_lock
4215  *
4216  * return: error code
4217  * entry_ptr(in):
4218  * to_be_lock(in):
4219  * ex_lock(out): ex-lock mode
4220  *
4221  */
4222 static int
4223 lock_internal_demote_class_lock (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, LK_ENTRY * entry_ptr, LOCK to_be_lock, LOCK * ex_lock)
4224 {
4225  LK_RES *res_ptr; /* lock resource entry pointer */
4226  LK_ENTRY *holder, *h; /* lock entry pointer */
4227  LOCK total_mode;
4228  int rv;
4229 
4230  /* The caller is not holding any mutex */
4231  assert (entry_ptr != NULL);
4232 
4233  res_ptr = entry_ptr->res_head;
4234 
4235  // expects a class lock entry
4236  assert (res_ptr->key.type == LOCK_RESOURCE_CLASS);
4237 
4238  rv = pthread_mutex_lock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
4239 
4240  /* find the given lock entry in the holder list */
4241  for (holder = res_ptr->holder; holder != NULL; holder = holder->next)
4242  {
4243  if (holder == entry_ptr)
4244  {
4245  break;
4246  }
4247  }
4248 
4249  if (holder == NULL)
4250  {
4251  /* not found */
4252  assert (holder != NULL);
4253  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
4254  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_NOTFOUND_IN_LOCK_HOLDER_LIST, 5,
4255  LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (entry_ptr->granted_mode), entry_ptr->tran_index,
4256  OID_AS_ARGS (&res_ptr->key.oid));
4257  return ER_LK_NOTFOUND_IN_LOCK_HOLDER_LIST;
4258  }
4259 
4260  // to_be_lock mode should be weaker than the current lock.
4261  assert (NULL_LOCK < to_be_lock && to_be_lock != U_LOCK && to_be_lock < holder->granted_mode);
4262 
4263 #if defined(LK_DUMP)
4264  if (lk_Gl.dump_level >= 1)
4265  {
4266  fprintf (stderr, "LK_DUMP::lk_demote_class_lock ()\n"
4267  " tran(%2d) : oid(%d|%d|%d), class_oid(%d|%d|%d), LOCK(%7s -> %7s)\n", entry_ptr->tran_index,
4268  OID_AS_ARGS (&entry_ptr->res_head->key.oid), OID_AS_ARGS (&entry_ptr->res_head->key.class_oid),
4269  LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (entry_ptr->granted_mode), LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (to_be_lock));
4270  }
4271 #endif /* LK_DUMP */
4272 
4273  *ex_lock = holder->granted_mode;
4274 
4275  /* demote the class lock(granted mode) of the lock entry */
4276  holder->granted_mode = to_be_lock;
4277 
4278  /* change total_holders_mode */
4279  total_mode = NULL_LOCK;
4280  for (h = res_ptr->holder; h != NULL; h = h->next)
4281  {
4282  assert (h->granted_mode >= NULL_LOCK && total_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
4283  total_mode = lock_Conv[h->granted_mode][total_mode];
4284  assert (total_mode != NA_LOCK);
4285 
4286  assert (h->blocked_mode >= NULL_LOCK && total_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
4287  total_mode = lock_Conv[h->blocked_mode][total_mode];
4288  assert (total_mode != NA_LOCK);
4289  }
4290  res_ptr->total_holders_mode = total_mode;
4291 
4292  /* grant the blocked holders and blocked waiters */
4293  lock_grant_blocked_holder (thread_p, res_ptr);
4294  (void) lock_grant_blocked_waiter (thread_p, res_ptr);
4295 
4296  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
4297 
4298  return NO_ERROR;
4299 }
4300 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
4301 
4302 /*
4303  * Private Functions Group: demote, unlock and remove locks
4304  *
4305  * - lock_demote_all_shared_class_locks()
4306  * - lock_unlock_shared_inst_lock()
4307  * - lock_remove_all_class_locks()
4308  * - lock_remove_all_inst_locks()
4309  */
4310 
4311 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
4312 /*
4313  * lock_demote_read_class_lock_for_checksumdb - Demote one shared class lock to intention shared only for checksumdb
4314  *
4315  * return:
4316  *
4317  * tran_index(in):
4318  * class_oid(in):
4319  *
4320  * Note: This is exported ONLY for checksumdb. NEVER consider to use this function for any other clients/threads.
4321  *
4322  * Note:This function finds the lock entry whose lock object id is same with the given class_oid in the transaction
4323  * lock hold list. And then, demote the class lock if the class lock is shared mode.
4324  */
4325 void
4326 lock_demote_read_class_lock_for_checksumdb (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int tran_index, const OID * class_oid)
4327 {
4328  LK_ENTRY *entry_ptr;
4329  LOCK ex_lock;
4330 
4331  /* The caller is not holding any mutex */
4332 
4333  /* demote only one class lock */
4334  entry_ptr = lock_find_tran_hold_entry (thread_p, tran_index, class_oid, true);
4335  if (entry_ptr == NULL)
4336  {
4337  assert (entry_ptr != NULL);
4338  return;
4339  }
4340 
4341  if (entry_ptr->granted_mode == S_LOCK)
4342  {
4343  (void) lock_internal_demote_class_lock (thread_p, entry_ptr, IS_LOCK, &ex_lock);
4344  }
4345 }
4346 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
4347 
4348 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
4349 /*
4350  * lock_demote_all_shared_class_locks - Demote all shared class locks
4351  *
4352  * return:
4353  *
4354  * tran_index(in):
4355  *
4356  * Note:This function demotes all shared class locks that are held
4357  * by the given transaction.
4358  */
4359 static void
4360 lock_demote_all_shared_class_locks (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int tran_index)
4361 {
4362  LK_TRAN_LOCK *tran_lock;
4363  LK_ENTRY *curr, *next;
4364  LOCK ex_lock;
4365 
4366  /* When this function is called, only one thread is executing for the transaction. (transaction : thread = 1 : 1)
4367  * Therefore, there is no need to hold tran_lock->hold_mutex. */
4368 
4369  tran_lock = &lk_Gl.tran_lock_table[tran_index];
4370 
4371  /* 1. demote general class locks */
4372  curr = tran_lock->class_hold_list;
4373  while (curr != NULL)
4374  {
4375  assert (tran_index == curr->tran_index);
4376 
4377  next = curr->tran_next;
4378 
4379  if (curr->granted_mode == S_LOCK)
4380  {
4381  // S -> IS
4382  (void) lock_internal_demote_class_lock (thread_p, curr, IS_LOCK, &ex_lock);
4383  }
4384  else if (curr->granted_mode == SIX_LOCK)
4385  {
4386  // SIX -> IX
4387  (void) lock_internal_demote_class_lock (thread_p, curr, IX_LOCK, &ex_lock);
4388  }
4389 
4390  curr = next;
4391  }
4392 
4393  /* 2. demote root class lock */
4394  curr = tran_lock->root_class_hold;
4395  if (curr != NULL)
4396  {
4397  assert (tran_index == curr->tran_index);
4398 
4399  if (curr->granted_mode == S_LOCK)
4400  {
4401  // S -> IS
4402  (void) lock_internal_demote_class_lock (thread_p, curr, IS_LOCK, &ex_lock);
4403  }
4404  else if (curr->granted_mode == SIX_LOCK)
4405  {
4406  // SIX -> IX
4407  (void) lock_internal_demote_class_lock (thread_p, curr, IX_LOCK, &ex_lock);
4408  }
4409  }
4410 }
4411 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
4412 
4413 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
4414 /*
4415  * lk_unlock_shared_inst_lock - Unlock one shared instance lock
4416  *
4417  * return:
4418  *
4419  * tran_index(in):
4420  * inst_oid(in):
4421  *
4422  * Note:This function finds the lock entry whose lock object id is same
4423  * with the given inst_oid in the transaction lock hold list. And then,
4424  * unlock the instance lock if the instance lock is shared lock.
4425  */
4426 static void
4427 lock_unlock_shared_inst_lock (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int tran_index, const OID * inst_oid)
4428 {
4429  LK_ENTRY *entry_ptr;
4430 
4431  /* unlock the shared instance lock (S_LOCK) */
4432  entry_ptr = lock_find_tran_hold_entry (thread_p, tran_index, inst_oid, false);
4433 
4434  if (entry_ptr != NULL && entry_ptr->granted_mode == S_LOCK)
4435  {
4436  lock_internal_perform_unlock_object (thread_p, entry_ptr, false, true);
4437  }
4438 }
4439 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
4440 
4441 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
4442 /*
4443  * lock_remove_all_class_locks - Remove class locks whose lock mode is lower than the given lock mode
4444  *
4445  * return:
4446  *
4447  * tran_index(in):
4448  * lock(in):
4449  *
4450  * Note:This function removes class locks whose lock mode is lower than the given lock mode.
4451  */
4452 static void
4453 lock_remove_all_class_locks (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int tran_index, LOCK lock)
4454 {
4455  LK_TRAN_LOCK *tran_lock;
4456  LK_ENTRY *curr, *next;
4457 
4458  /* When this function is called, only one thread is executing for the transaction. (transaction : thread = 1 : 1)
4459  * Therefore, there is no need to hold tran_lock->hold_mutex. */
4460 
4461  tran_lock = &lk_Gl.tran_lock_table[tran_index];
4462 
4463  /* remove class locks if given condition is satisfied */
4464  curr = tran_lock->class_hold_list;
4465  while (curr != NULL)
4466  {
4467  assert (tran_index == curr->tran_index);
4468 
4469  next = curr->tran_next;
4470  if (curr->granted_mode <= lock)
4471  {
4472  lock_internal_perform_unlock_object (thread_p, curr, true, false);
4473  }
4474  curr = next;
4475  }
4476 
4477  /* remove root class lock if given condition is satisfied */
4478  curr = tran_lock->root_class_hold;
4479  if (curr != NULL)
4480  {
4481  assert (tran_index == curr->tran_index);
4482 
4483  if (curr->granted_mode <= lock)
4484  {
4485  lock_internal_perform_unlock_object (thread_p, curr, true, false);
4486  }
4487  }
4488 
4489 }
4490 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
4491 
4492 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
4493 /*
4494  * lock_remove_all_inst_locks - Remove instance locks whose lock mode is lower than the given lock mode
4495  *
4496  * return:
4497  *
4498  * tran_index(in):
4499  * class_oid(in):
4500  * lock(in):
4501  *
4502  * Note:This function removes instance locks whose lock mode is lower than the given lock mode.
4503  */
4504 void
4505 lock_remove_all_inst_locks (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int tran_index, const OID * class_oid, LOCK lock)
4506 {
4507  LK_TRAN_LOCK *tran_lock;
4508  LK_ENTRY *curr, *next;
4509 
4510  tran_lock = &lk_Gl.tran_lock_table[tran_index];
4511 
4512  /* remove instance locks if given condition is satisfied */
4513  curr = tran_lock->inst_hold_list;
4514  while (curr != NULL)
4515  {
4516  assert (tran_index == curr->tran_index);
4517 
4518  next = curr->tran_next;
4519  if (class_oid == NULL || OID_ISNULL (class_oid) || OID_EQ (&curr->res_head->key.class_oid, class_oid))
4520  {
4521  if (curr->granted_mode <= lock || lock == X_LOCK)
4522  {
4523  /* found : the same class_oid and interesting lock mode --> unlock it. */
4524  lock_internal_perform_unlock_object (thread_p, curr, true, false);
4525  }
4526  }
4527  curr = next;
4528  }
4529 
4530 }
4531 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
4532 
4533 /*
4534  * Private Functions Group: non two pahse locks
4535  *
4536  * - lk_remove_non2pl()
4537  * - lk_update_non2pl_list()
4538  */
4539 
4540 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
4541 /*
4542  * lock_remove_non2pl -
4543  *
4544  * return:
4545  *
4546  * non2pl(in):
4547  * tran_index(in):
4548  */
4549 static void
4550 lock_remove_non2pl (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, LK_ENTRY * non2pl, int tran_index)
4551 {
4552  LF_TRAN_ENTRY *t_entry = thread_get_tran_entry (thread_p, THREAD_TS_OBJ_LOCK_ENT);
4553  LK_RES *res_ptr;
4554  LK_ENTRY *prev, *curr;
4555  int rv;
4556 
4557  /* The given non2pl entry has already been removed from the transaction non2pl list. Therefore, This function removes
4558  * the given non2pl entry from the resource non2pl list and then frees the entry. */
4559 
4560  res_ptr = non2pl->res_head;
4561  rv = pthread_mutex_lock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
4562 
4563  /* find the given non2pl in non2pl list of resource entry */
4564  prev = NULL;
4565  curr = res_ptr->non2pl;
4566  while (curr != NULL)
4567  {
4568  if (curr->tran_index == tran_index)
4569  {
4570  break;
4571  }
4572  prev = curr;
4573  curr = curr->next;
4574  }
4575  if (curr == NULL)
4576  { /* not found */
4577  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
4578  return;
4579  }
4580 
4581  /* found : remove it */
4582  if (prev == NULL)
4583  {
4584  res_ptr->non2pl = curr->next;
4585  }
4586  else
4587  {
4588  prev->next = curr->next;
4589  }
4590  /* (void)lk_delete_from_tran_non2pl_list(curr); */
4591 
4592  /* free the lock entry */
4593  lock_free_entry (tran_index, t_entry, &lk_Gl.obj_free_entry_list, curr);
4594 
4595  if (res_ptr->holder == NULL && res_ptr->waiter == NULL && res_ptr->non2pl == NULL)
4596  {
4597  (void) lock_remove_resource (thread_p, res_ptr);
4598  }
4599  else
4600  {
4601  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
4602  }
4603 
4604 }
4605 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
4606 
4607 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
4608 /*
4609  * lock_update_non2pl_list -
4610  *
4611  * return:
4612  *
4613  * res_ptr(in):
4614  * tran_index(in):
4615  * lock(in):
4616  */
4617 static void
4618 lock_update_non2pl_list (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, LK_RES * res_ptr, int tran_index, LOCK lock)
4619 {
4620  LF_TRAN_ENTRY *t_entry = thread_get_tran_entry (thread_p, THREAD_TS_OBJ_LOCK_ENT);
4621  LK_ENTRY *prev;
4622  LK_ENTRY *curr;
4623  LK_ENTRY *next;
4624  LK_TRAN_LOCK *tran_lock;
4625  int rv;
4626  LOCK_COMPATIBILITY compat;
4627 
4628  /* The caller is holding a resource mutex */
4629 
4630  prev = NULL;
4631  curr = res_ptr->non2pl;
4632  while (curr != NULL)
4633  {
4634  if (curr->tran_index == tran_index)
4635  { /* same transaction */
4636  /* remove current non2pl entry */
4637  next = curr->next;
4638  if (prev == NULL)
4639  {
4640  res_ptr->non2pl = curr->next;
4641  }
4642  else
4643  {
4644  prev->next = curr->next;
4645  }
4646  (void) lock_delete_from_tran_non2pl_list (curr, tran_index);
4647  lock_free_entry (tran_index, t_entry, &lk_Gl.obj_free_entry_list, curr);
4648  curr = next;
4649  }
4650  else
4651  { /* different transaction */
4652  if (curr->granted_mode != INCON_NON_TWO_PHASE_LOCK)
4653  {
4654  /* The transaction with the released lock must decache the lock object since an incompatible locks has
4655  * been acquired. This implies that the transaction with the released lock may not be serializable
4656  * (repeatable read consistent) any longer. */
4657  assert (lock >= NULL_LOCK && curr->granted_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
4658  compat = lock_Comp[lock][curr->granted_mode];
4659  assert (compat != LOCK_COMPAT_UNKNOWN);
4660 
4661  if (compat == LOCK_COMPAT_NO)
4662  {
4663  curr->granted_mode = INCON_NON_TWO_PHASE_LOCK;
4664  tran_lock = &lk_Gl.tran_lock_table[curr->tran_index];
4665  rv = pthread_mutex_lock (&tran_lock->non2pl_mutex);
4666  tran_lock->num_incons_non2pl += 1;
4667  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->non2pl_mutex);
4668  }
4669  }
4670  prev = curr;
4671  curr = curr->next;
4672  }
4673  }
4674 
4675 }
4676 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
4677 
4678 /*
4679  * Private Functions Group: local deadlock detection and resolution
4680  *
4681  * - lk_add_WFG_edge()
4682  */
4683 
4684 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
4685 /*
4686  * lock_add_WFG_edge -
4687  *
4688  * return: error code
4689  *
4690  * from_tran_index(in): waiting transaction index
4691  * to_tran_index(in): waited transaction index
4692  * holder_flag(in): true(if to_tran_index is Holder), false(otherwise)
4693  * edge_wait_stime(in):
4694  *
4695  * Note:add an edge to WFG which represents that
4696  * 'from_tran_index' transaction waits for 'to_tran_index' transaction.
4697  */
4698 static int
4699 lock_add_WFG_edge (int from_tran_index, int to_tran_index, int holder_flag, INT64 edge_wait_stime)
4700 {
4701  int prev, curr;
4702  int i;
4703  int alloc_idx;
4704  char *temp_ptr;
4705 
4706  /* check if the transactions has been selected as victims */
4707  /* Note that the transactions might be old deadlock victims */
4708  if (lk_Gl.TWFG_node[from_tran_index].DL_victim == true || lk_Gl.TWFG_node[to_tran_index].DL_victim == true)
4709  {
4710  return NO_ERROR;
4711  }
4712 
4713  /* increment global edge sequence number */
4714  lk_Gl.global_edge_seq_num++;
4715 
4716  if (lk_Gl.TWFG_node[from_tran_index].checked_by_deadlock_detector == false)
4717  {
4718  /* a new transaction started */
4719  if (lk_Gl.TWFG_node[from_tran_index].first_edge != -1)
4720  {
4721  prev = -1;
4722  curr = lk_Gl.TWFG_node[from_tran_index].first_edge;
4723  while (curr != -1)
4724  {
4725  prev = curr;
4726  curr = lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[curr].next;
4727  }
4728  lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[prev].next = lk_Gl.TWFG_free_edge_idx;
4729  lk_Gl.TWFG_free_edge_idx = lk_Gl.TWFG_node[from_tran_index].first_edge;
4730  lk_Gl.TWFG_node[from_tran_index].first_edge = -1;
4731  }
4732  lk_Gl.TWFG_node[from_tran_index].checked_by_deadlock_detector = true;
4733  lk_Gl.TWFG_node[from_tran_index].tran_edge_seq_num = lk_Gl.global_edge_seq_num;
4734  }
4735 
4736  if (lk_Gl.TWFG_node[to_tran_index].checked_by_deadlock_detector == false)
4737  {
4738  /* a new transaction started */
4739  if (lk_Gl.TWFG_node[to_tran_index].first_edge != -1)
4740  {
4741  prev = -1;
4742  curr = lk_Gl.TWFG_node[to_tran_index].first_edge;
4743  while (curr != -1)
4744  {
4745  prev = curr;
4746  curr = lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[curr].next;
4747  }
4748  lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[prev].next = lk_Gl.TWFG_free_edge_idx;
4749  lk_Gl.TWFG_free_edge_idx = lk_Gl.TWFG_node[to_tran_index].first_edge;
4750  lk_Gl.TWFG_node[to_tran_index].first_edge = -1;
4751  }
4752  lk_Gl.TWFG_node[to_tran_index].checked_by_deadlock_detector = true;
4753  lk_Gl.TWFG_node[to_tran_index].tran_edge_seq_num = lk_Gl.global_edge_seq_num;
4754  }
4755 
4756  /* NOTE the following description.. According to the above code, whenever it is identified that a transaction has
4757  * been terminated during deadlock detection, the transaction is checked again as a new transaction. And, the current
4758  * edge is based on the current active transactions. */
4759 
4760  if (lk_Gl.TWFG_free_edge_idx == -1)
4761  { /* too many WFG edges */
4762  if (lk_Gl.max_TWFG_edge == LK_MIN_TWFG_EDGE_COUNT)
4763  {
4764  lk_Gl.max_TWFG_edge = LK_MID_TWFG_EDGE_COUNT;
4765  for (i = LK_MIN_TWFG_EDGE_COUNT; i < lk_Gl.max_TWFG_edge; i++)
4766  {
4767  lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[i].to_tran_index = -1;
4768  lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[i].next = (i + 1);
4769  }
4770  lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[lk_Gl.max_TWFG_edge - 1].next = -1;
4771  lk_Gl.TWFG_free_edge_idx = LK_MIN_TWFG_EDGE_COUNT;
4772  }
4773  else if (lk_Gl.max_TWFG_edge == LK_MID_TWFG_EDGE_COUNT)
4774  {
4775  temp_ptr = (char *) lk_Gl.TWFG_edge;
4776  lk_Gl.max_TWFG_edge = LK_MAX_TWFG_EDGE_COUNT;
4777  lk_Gl.TWFG_edge = (LK_WFG_EDGE *) malloc (SIZEOF_LK_WFG_EDGE * lk_Gl.max_TWFG_edge);
4778  if (lk_Gl.TWFG_edge == NULL)
4779  {
4780  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_OUT_OF_VIRTUAL_MEMORY, 1,
4781  (size_t) (SIZEOF_LK_WFG_EDGE * lk_Gl.max_TWFG_edge));
4782  return ER_OUT_OF_VIRTUAL_MEMORY; /* no method */
4783  }
4784  (void) memcpy ((char *) lk_Gl.TWFG_edge, temp_ptr, (SIZEOF_LK_WFG_EDGE * LK_MID_TWFG_EDGE_COUNT));
4785  for (i = LK_MID_TWFG_EDGE_COUNT; i < lk_Gl.max_TWFG_edge; i++)
4786  {
4787  lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[i].to_tran_index = -1;
4788  lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[i].next = (i + 1);
4789  }
4790  lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[lk_Gl.max_TWFG_edge - 1].next = -1;
4791  lk_Gl.TWFG_free_edge_idx = LK_MID_TWFG_EDGE_COUNT;
4792  }
4793  else
4794  {
4795 #if defined(CUBRID_DEBUG)
4796  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "So many TWFG edges are used..\n");
4797 #endif /* CUBRID_DEBUG */
4798  return ER_FAILED; /* no method */
4799  }
4800  }
4801 
4802  /* allocate free WFG edge */
4803  alloc_idx = lk_Gl.TWFG_free_edge_idx;
4804  lk_Gl.TWFG_free_edge_idx = lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[alloc_idx].next;
4805 
4806  /* set WFG edge with given information */
4807  lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[alloc_idx].to_tran_index = to_tran_index;
4808  lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[alloc_idx].edge_seq_num = lk_Gl.global_edge_seq_num;
4809  lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[alloc_idx].holder_flag = holder_flag;
4810  lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[alloc_idx].edge_wait_stime = edge_wait_stime;
4811 
4812  /* connect the WFG edge into WFG */
4813  lk_Gl.TWFG_edge[alloc_idx].next = lk_Gl.TWFG_node[from_tran_index].first_edge;
4814  lk_Gl.TWFG_node[from_tran_index].first_edge = alloc_idx;
4815 
4816  return NO_ERROR;
4817 }
4818 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
4819 
4820 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
4821 /*
4822  * lock_select_deadlock_victim -
4823  *
4824  * return:
4825  *
4826  * s(in):
4827  * t(in):
4828  *
4829  * Note:
4830  */
4831 static void
4832 lock_select_deadlock_victim (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int s, int t)
4833 {
4834  LK_WFG_NODE *TWFG_node;
4835  LK_WFG_EDGE *TWFG_edge;
4836  TRANID tranid;
4837  TRANID victim_tranid;
4838  bool can_timeout;
4839  int i, u, v, w, n;
4840  bool false_dd_cycle = false;
4841  bool lock_holder_found = false;
4842  bool inact_trans_found = false;
4843  int tot_WFG_nodes;
4844 #if defined(CUBRID_DEBUG)
4845  int num_WFG_nodes;
4846  int WFG_nidx;
4847  int tran_index_area[20];
4848  int *tran_index_set = &tran_index_area[0];
4849 #endif
4850  char *cycle_info_string;
4851  char *ptr;
4852  int num_tran_in_cycle;
4853  int unit_size = LOG_USERNAME_MAX + MAXHOSTNAMELEN + PATH_MAX + 10;
4854  char *client_prog_name, *client_user_name, *client_host_name;
4855  int client_pid;
4856  int next_node;
4857  int *tran_index_in_cycle = NULL;
4858  int victim_tran_index;
4859  int tran_log_count, victim_tran_log_count;
4860 
4861  /* simple notation */
4862  TWFG_node = lk_Gl.TWFG_node;
4863  TWFG_edge = lk_Gl.TWFG_edge;
4864 
4865  /*
4866  * check if current deadlock cycle is false deadlock cycle
4867  */
4868  tot_WFG_nodes = 0;
4869  if (TWFG_node[t].current == -1)
4870  {
4871  /* old WFG edge : remove it */
4872  TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[s].current].to_tran_index = -2;
4873  false_dd_cycle = true;
4874  }
4875  else
4876  {
4877  if (TWFG_node[t].checked_by_deadlock_detector == false || TWFG_node[t].thrd_wait_stime == 0
4878  || (TWFG_node[t].thrd_wait_stime > TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[t].current].edge_wait_stime))
4879  {
4880  /* old transaction, not lockwait state, or incorrect WFG edge */
4881  /* remove all outgoing edges */
4882  TWFG_node[t].first_edge = -1;
4883  TWFG_node[t].current = -1;
4884  /* remove incoming edge */
4885  TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[s].current].to_tran_index = -2;
4886  false_dd_cycle = true;
4887  }
4888  else
4889  {
4890  if (TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[s].current].edge_seq_num < TWFG_node[t].tran_edge_seq_num)
4891  {
4892  /* old WFG edge : remove it */
4893  TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[s].current].to_tran_index = -2;
4894  false_dd_cycle = true;
4895  }
4896  else
4897  {
4898  tot_WFG_nodes += 1;
4899  }
4900  }
4901  }
4902  for (v = s; v != t;)
4903  {
4904  u = lk_Gl.TWFG_node[v].ancestor;
4905  if (TWFG_node[v].current == -1)
4906  {
4907  /* old WFG edge : remove it */
4908  TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[u].current].to_tran_index = -2;
4909  false_dd_cycle = true;
4910  }
4911  else
4912  {
4913  if (TWFG_node[v].checked_by_deadlock_detector == false || TWFG_node[v].thrd_wait_stime == 0
4914  || (TWFG_node[v].thrd_wait_stime > TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[v].current].edge_wait_stime))
4915  {
4916  /* old transaction, not lockwait state, or incorrect WFG edge */
4917  /* remove all outgoing edges */
4918  TWFG_node[v].first_edge = -1;
4919  TWFG_node[v].current = -1;
4920  /* remove incoming edge */
4921  TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[u].current].to_tran_index = -2;
4922  false_dd_cycle = true;
4923  }
4924  else
4925  {
4926  if (TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[u].current].edge_seq_num < TWFG_node[v].tran_edge_seq_num)
4927  {
4928  /* old WFG edge : remove it */
4929  TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[u].current].to_tran_index = -2;
4930  false_dd_cycle = true;
4931  }
4932  else
4933  {
4934  tot_WFG_nodes += 1;
4935  }
4936  }
4937  }
4938  v = u;
4939  }
4940 
4941  if (false_dd_cycle == true)
4942  { /* clear deadlock cycle */
4943  for (v = s; v != t;)
4944  {
4945  w = TWFG_node[v].ancestor;
4946  TWFG_node[v].ancestor = -1;
4947  v = w;
4948  }
4949  return;
4950  }
4951 
4952  /*
4953  * Victim Selection Strategy 1) Must be lock holder. 2) Must be active transaction. 3) Prefer a transaction does not
4954  * have victim priority. 4) Prefer a transaction has written less log records. 5) Prefer a transaction with a closer
4955  * timeout. 6) Prefer the youngest transaction. */
4956 #if defined(CUBRID_DEBUG)
4957  num_WFG_nodes = tot_WFG_nodes;
4958  if (num_WFG_nodes > 20)
4959  {
4960  tran_index_set = (int *) malloc (sizeof (int) * num_WFG_nodes);
4961  if (tran_index_set == NULL)
4962  {
4963  num_WFG_nodes = 20;
4964  tran_index_set = &tran_index_area[0];
4965  }
4966  }
4967  WFG_nidx = 0;
4968 
4969  if (TWFG_node[t].checked_by_deadlock_detector == false)
4970  {
4971  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "transaction(index=%d) is old in deadlock cycle\n", t);
4972  }
4973 #endif /* CUBRID_DEBUG */
4974  if (TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[s].current].holder_flag)
4975  {
