4976  tranid = logtb_find_tranid (t);
4977  if (logtb_is_active (thread_p, tranid) == false)
4978  {
4979  victims[victim_count].tran_index = NULL_TRAN_INDEX;
4980  inact_trans_found = true;
4981 #if defined(CUBRID_DEBUG)
4982  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE,
4983  "Inactive transaction is found in a deadlock cycle\n(tran_index=%d, tranid=%d, state=%s)\n",
4984  t, tranid, log_state_string (logtb_find_state (t)));
4985  tran_index_set[WFG_nidx] = t;
4986  WFG_nidx += 1;
4987 #endif /* CUBRID_DEBUG */
4988  }
4989  else
4990  {
4991  victims[victim_count].tran_index = t;
4992  victims[victim_count].tranid = tranid;
4993  victims[victim_count].can_timeout = LK_CAN_TIMEOUT (logtb_find_wait_msecs (t));
4994  lock_holder_found = true;
4995  }
4996  }
4997  else
4998  {
4999  victims[victim_count].tran_index = NULL_TRAN_INDEX;
5000 #if defined(CUBRID_DEBUG)
5001  tran_index_set[WFG_nidx] = t;
5002  WFG_nidx += 1;
5003 #endif
5004  }
5005 
5006  victims[victim_count].tran_index_in_cycle = NULL;
5007  victims[victim_count].num_trans_in_cycle = 0;
5008 
5009  num_tran_in_cycle = 1;
5010  for (v = s; v != t; v = TWFG_node[v].ancestor)
5011  {
5012  num_tran_in_cycle++;
5013  }
5014 
5015  cycle_info_string = (char *) malloc (unit_size * num_tran_in_cycle);
5016  tran_index_in_cycle = (int *) malloc (sizeof (int) * num_tran_in_cycle);
5017 
5018  if (cycle_info_string != NULL && tran_index_in_cycle != NULL)
5019  {
5020  int i;
5021 
5022  ptr = cycle_info_string;
5023 
5024  for (i = 0, v = s; i < num_tran_in_cycle; i++, v = TWFG_node[v].ancestor)
5025  {
5026  (void) logtb_find_client_name_host_pid (v, &client_prog_name, &client_user_name, &client_host_name,
5027  &client_pid);
5028 
5029  n =
5030  snprintf (ptr, unit_size, "%s%s@%s|%s(%d)", ((v == s) ? "" : ", "), client_user_name, client_host_name,
5031  client_prog_name, client_pid);
5032  ptr += n;
5033  assert_release (ptr < cycle_info_string + unit_size * num_tran_in_cycle);
5034 
5035  tran_index_in_cycle[i] = v;
5036  }
5037  }
5038 
5039  er_set (ER_NOTIFICATION_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_DEADLOCK_CYCLE_DETECTED, 1,
5040  (cycle_info_string) ? cycle_info_string : "");
5041 
5042  if (cycle_info_string != NULL)
5043  {
5044  free_and_init (cycle_info_string);
5045  }
5046 
5047  for (v = s; v != t;)
5048  {
5049 #if defined(CUBRID_DEBUG)
5050  if (TWFG_node[v].checked_by_deadlock_detector == false)
5051  {
5052  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "transaction(index=%d) is old in deadlock cycle\n", v);
5053  }
5054 #endif /* CUBRID_DEBUG */
5055  if (TWFG_node[v].candidate == true)
5056  {
5057  tranid = logtb_find_tranid (v);
5058  victim_tran_index = victims[victim_count].tran_index;
5059  if (logtb_is_active (thread_p, tranid) == false) /* Must be active transaction. */
5060  {
5061  inact_trans_found = true;
5062 #if defined(CUBRID_DEBUG)
5063  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE,
5064  "Inactive transaction is found in a deadlock cycle\n"
5065  "(tran_index=%d, tranid=%d, state=%s)\n", v, tranid,
5066  log_state_string (logtb_find_state (v)));
5067  tran_index_set[WFG_nidx] = v;
5068  WFG_nidx += 1;
5069 #endif /* CUBRID_DEBUG */
5070  }
5071  else
5072  {
5073  victim_tranid = NULL_TRANID;
5074  lock_holder_found = true;
5075  can_timeout = LK_CAN_TIMEOUT (logtb_find_wait_msecs (v));
5076  if (victim_tran_index == NULL_TRAN_INDEX)
5077  {
5078  victim_tranid = tranid;
5079  }
5080  else if (logtb_has_deadlock_priority (victim_tran_index) != logtb_has_deadlock_priority (v))
5081  {
5082  /* Prefer a transaction does not have victim priority. */
5083  if (logtb_has_deadlock_priority (v) == false)
5084  {
5085  victim_tranid = tranid;
5086  }
5087  }
5088  else
5089  {
5090  tran_log_count = logtb_find_log_records_count (v);
5091  victim_tran_log_count = logtb_find_log_records_count (victim_tran_index);
5092 
5093  if (tran_log_count != victim_tran_log_count)
5094  {
5095  if (tran_log_count < victim_tran_log_count)
5096  {
5097  /* Prefer a transaction has written less log records. */
5098  victim_tranid = tranid;
5099  }
5100  }
5101  else
5102  {
5103  /*
5104  * Prefer a transaction with a closer timeout.
5105  * Prefer the youngest transaction.
5106  */
5107  if ((victims[victim_count].can_timeout == false && can_timeout == true)
5108  || (victims[victim_count].can_timeout == can_timeout
5109  && (LK_ISYOUNGER (tranid, victims[victim_count].tranid))))
5110  {
5111  victim_tranid = tranid;
5112  }
5113  }
5114  }
5115 
5116  if (victim_tranid != NULL_TRANID)
5117  {
5118  victims[victim_count].tran_index = v;
5119  victims[victim_count].tranid = victim_tranid;
5120  victims[victim_count].can_timeout = can_timeout;
5121  }
5122  }
5123  }
5124 #if defined(CUBRID_DEBUG)
5125  else
5126  { /* TWFG_node[v].candidate == false */
5127  tran_index_set[WFG_nidx] = v;
5128  WFG_nidx += 1;
5129  }
5130 #endif
5131  v = TWFG_node[v].ancestor;
5132  }
5133 
5134  if (victims[victim_count].tran_index != NULL_TRAN_INDEX)
5135  {
5136 #if defined(CUBRID_DEBUG)
5137  if (TWFG_node[victims[victim_count].tran_index].checked_by_deadlock_detector == false)
5138  {
5139  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "victim(index=%d) is old in deadlock cycle\n", victims[victim_count].tran_index);
5140  }
5141 #endif /* CUBRID_DEBUG */
5142  TWFG_node[victims[victim_count].tran_index].current = -1;
5143  victims[victim_count].tran_index_in_cycle = tran_index_in_cycle;
5144  victims[victim_count].num_trans_in_cycle = num_tran_in_cycle;
5145  victim_count++;
5146  }
5147  else
5148  {
5149  /* We can't find active holder. In this case, this cycle is regarded as a false deadlock. */
5150  for (i = 0, v = s; i < num_tran_in_cycle; v = TWFG_node[v].ancestor, i++)
5151  {
5152  assert_release (TWFG_node[v].current >= 0 && TWFG_node[v].current < lk_Gl.max_TWFG_edge);
5153 
5154  next_node = TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[v].current].to_tran_index;
5155 
5156  if (TWFG_node[next_node].checked_by_deadlock_detector == false || TWFG_node[next_node].thrd_wait_stime == 0
5157  || TWFG_node[next_node].thrd_wait_stime > TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[next_node].current].edge_wait_stime)
5158  {
5159  /* The edge from v to next_node is removed(false edge). */
5160  TWFG_node[next_node].first_edge = -1;
5161  TWFG_node[next_node].current = -1;
5162  TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[v].current].to_tran_index = -2;
5163  TWFG_node[v].current = TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[v].current].next;
5164  break;
5165  }
5166  }
5167 
5168  if (i == num_tran_in_cycle)
5169  {
5170  /* can't find false edge */
5171  TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[s].current].to_tran_index = -2;
5172  TWFG_node[s].current = TWFG_edge[TWFG_node[s].current].next;
5173  }
5174 
5175  if (tran_index_in_cycle != NULL)
5176  {
5177  free_and_init (tran_index_in_cycle);
5178  }
5179 
5180 #if defined(CUBRID_DEBUG)
5181  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "No victim in deadlock cycle....\n");
5182  if (lock_holder_found == false)
5183  {
5184  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "Any Lock holder is not found in deadlock cycle.\n");
5185  }
5186  if (inact_trans_found == true)
5187  {
5188  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "Inactive transactions are found in deadlock cycle.\n");
5189  }
5190  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "total_edges=%d, free_edge_idx=%d, global_edge_seq=%d\n", lk_Gl.max_TWFG_edge,
5191  lk_Gl.TWFG_free_edge_idx, lk_Gl.global_edge_seq_num);
5192  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "# of WFG nodes in deadlock cycle = %d (%d printed)\n", tot_WFG_nodes,
5193  num_WFG_nodes);
5194  for (WFG_nidx = 0; WFG_nidx < num_WFG_nodes; WFG_nidx++)
5195  {
5196  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "%3d ", tran_index_set[WFG_nidx]);
5197  if ((WFG_nidx + 1) == num_WFG_nodes || (WFG_nidx % 10) == 9)
5198  {
5199  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "\n");
5200  }
5201  }
5202 #endif /* CUBRID_DEBUG */
5203  }
5204 
5205  for (v = s; v != t;)
5206  {
5207  w = TWFG_node[v].ancestor;
5208  TWFG_node[v].ancestor = -1;
5209  v = w;
5210  }
5211 }
5212 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
5213 
5214 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
5215 /*
5216  * lock_dump_deadlock_victims -
5217  *
5218  * return:
5219  */
5220 static void
5221 lock_dump_deadlock_victims (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, FILE * outfile)
5222 {
5223  int k, count;
5224 
5225  fprintf (outfile, "*** Deadlock Victim Information ***\n");
5226  fprintf (outfile, "Victim count = %d\n", victim_count);
5227  /* print aborted transactions (deadlock victims) */
5228  fprintf (outfile, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_DEADLOCK_ABORT_HDR));
5229  count = 0;
5230  for (k = 0; k < victim_count; k++)
5231  {
5232  if (!victims[k].can_timeout)
5233  {
5234  fprintf (outfile, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_DEADLOCK_ABORT),
5235  victims[k].tran_index);
5236  if ((count % 10) == 9)
5237  {
5238  fprintf (outfile, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_NEWLINE));
5239  }
5240  count++;
5241  }
5242  }
5243  fprintf (outfile, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_NEWLINE));
5244  /* print timeout transactions (deadlock victims) */
5245  fprintf (outfile, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_DEADLOCK_TIMEOUT_HDR));
5246  count = 0;
5247  for (k = 0; k < victim_count; k++)
5248  {
5249  if (victims[k].can_timeout)
5250  {
5251  fprintf (outfile, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_DEADLOCK_TIMEOUT),
5252  victims[k].tran_index);
5253  if ((count % 10) == 9)
5254  {
5255  fprintf (outfile, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_NEWLINE));
5256  }
5257  count++;
5258  }
5259  }
5260 
5261  xlock_dump (thread_p, outfile);
5262 }
5263 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
5264 
5265 /*
5266  * Private Functions Group: miscellaneous functions
5267  *
5268  * - lk_lockinfo_compare()
5269  * - lk_dump_res()
5270  * - lk_consistent_res()
5271  * - lk_consistent_tran_lock()
5272  */
5273 
5274 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
5275 /*
5276  * lock_compare_lock_info -
5277  *
5278  * return:
5279  *
5280  * lockinfo1(in):
5281  * lockinfo2(in):
5282  *
5283  * Note:compare two OID of lockable objects.
5284  */
5285 static int
5286 lock_compare_lock_info (const void *lockinfo1, const void *lockinfo2)
5287 {
5288  const OID *oid1;
5289  const OID *oid2;
5290 
5291  oid1 = &(((LK_LOCKINFO *) (lockinfo1))->oid);
5292  oid2 = &(((LK_LOCKINFO *) (lockinfo2))->oid);
5293 
5294  return oid_compare (oid1, oid2);
5295 }
5296 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
5297 
5298 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
5299 /*
5300  * lock_wait_msecs_to_secs -
5301  *
5302  * return: seconds
5303  *
5304  * msecs(in): milliseconds
5305  */
5306 static float
5307 lock_wait_msecs_to_secs (int msecs)
5308 {
5309  if (msecs > 0)
5310  {
5311  return (float) msecs / 1000;
5312  }
5313 
5314  return (float) msecs;
5315 }
5316 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
5317 
5318 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
5319 /*
5320  * lock_dump_resource - Dump locks acquired on a resource
5321  *
5322  * return:
5323  *
5324  * outfp(in): FILE stream where to dump the lock resource entry.
5325  * res_ptr(in): pointer to lock resource entry
5326  *
5327  * Note:Dump contents of the lock resource entry pointed by res_ptr.
5328  */
5329 static void
5330 lock_dump_resource (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, FILE * outfp, LK_RES * res_ptr)
5331 {
5332 #define TEMP_BUFFER_SIZE 128
5333  LK_ENTRY *entry_ptr;
5334  char *classname; /* Name of the class */
5335  int num_holders, num_blocked_holders, num_waiters;
5336  char time_val[CTIME_MAX];
5337  size_t time_str_len;
5338  OID *oid_rr = NULL;
5339  HEAP_SCANCACHE scan_cache;
5340  OID real_class_oid;
5341 
5342  memset (time_val, 0, sizeof (time_val));
5343 
5344  /* dump object identifier */
5345  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_OID), res_ptr->key.oid.volid,
5346  res_ptr->key.oid.pageid, res_ptr->key.oid.slotid);
5347 
5348  /* dump object type related information */
5349  switch (res_ptr->key.type)
5350  {
5351  case LOCK_RESOURCE_ROOT_CLASS:
5352  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_ROOT_CLASS_TYPE));
5353  break;
5354  case LOCK_RESOURCE_CLASS:
5355  oid_rr = oid_get_rep_read_tran_oid ();
5356  if (oid_rr != NULL && OID_EQ (&res_ptr->key.oid, oid_rr))
5357  {
5358  /* This is the generic object for RR transactions */
5359  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_RR_TYPE));
5360  }
5361  else if (!OID_ISTEMP (&res_ptr->key.oid))
5362  {
5363  if (OID_IS_VIRTUAL_CLASS_OF_DIR_OID (&res_ptr->key.oid))
5364  {
5365  OID_GET_REAL_CLASS_OF_DIR_OID (&res_ptr->key.oid, &real_class_oid);
5366  }
5367  else
5368  {
5369  COPY_OID (&real_class_oid, &res_ptr->key.oid);
5370  }
5371  /* Don't get class names for temporary class objects. */
5372  if (heap_get_class_name (thread_p, &real_class_oid, &classname) != NO_ERROR || classname == NULL)
5373  {
5374  /* We must stop processing if an interrupt occurs */
5375  if (er_errid () == ER_INTERRUPTED)
5376  {
5377  return;
5378  }
5379 
5380  /* Otherwise continue */
5381  er_clear ();
5382  }
5383  else
5384  {
5385  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_CLASS_TYPE),
5386  classname);
5387  free_and_init (classname);
5388  }
5389  }
5390  break;
5391  case LOCK_RESOURCE_INSTANCE:
5392  if (!OID_ISTEMP (&res_ptr->key.class_oid))
5393  {
5394  bool is_virtual_directory_oid;
5395 
5396  /* Don't get class names for temporary class objects. */
5397  if (OID_IS_VIRTUAL_CLASS_OF_DIR_OID (&res_ptr->key.class_oid))
5398  {
5399  is_virtual_directory_oid = true;
5400  OID_GET_REAL_CLASS_OF_DIR_OID (&res_ptr->key.class_oid, &real_class_oid);
5401  }
5402  else
5403  {
5404  is_virtual_directory_oid = false;
5405  COPY_OID (&real_class_oid, &res_ptr->key.class_oid);
5406  }
5407 
5408  if (heap_get_class_name (thread_p, &real_class_oid, &classname) != NO_ERROR || classname == NULL)
5409  {
5410  /* We must stop processing if an interrupt occurs */
5411  if (er_errid () == ER_INTERRUPTED)
5412  {
5413  return;
5414  }
5415 
5416  /* Otherwise continue */
5417  er_clear ();
5418  }
5419  else
5420  {
5421  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_INSTANCE_TYPE),
5422  res_ptr->key.class_oid.volid, res_ptr->key.class_oid.pageid, res_ptr->key.class_oid.slotid,
5423  classname);
5424  free_and_init (classname);
5425  }
5426 
5427  /* Dump MVCC info */
5428  if (is_virtual_directory_oid == false && heap_scancache_quick_start (&scan_cache) == NO_ERROR)
5429  {
5430  RECDES recdes;
5431 
5432  recdes.data = NULL;
5433 
5434  if (heap_get_visible_version (thread_p, &res_ptr->key.oid, &res_ptr->key.class_oid, &recdes, &scan_cache,
5435  PEEK, NULL_CHN) == S_SUCCESS)
5436  {
5437  MVCC_REC_HEADER mvcc_rec_header;
5438  if (or_mvcc_get_header (&recdes, &mvcc_rec_header) == NO_ERROR)
5439  {
5440  char str_insid[128], str_delid[128];
5441  if (MVCC_IS_FLAG_SET (&mvcc_rec_header, OR_MVCC_FLAG_VALID_INSID))
5442  {
5443  sprintf (str_insid, "%llu", (unsigned long long int) MVCC_GET_INSID (&mvcc_rec_header));
5444  }
5445  else
5446  {
5447  strcpy (str_insid, "missing");
5448  }
5449  if (MVCC_IS_HEADER_DELID_VALID (&mvcc_rec_header))
5450  {
5451  sprintf (str_delid, "%llu", (unsigned long long int) MVCC_GET_DELID (&mvcc_rec_header));
5452  }
5453  else
5454  {
5455  strcpy (str_delid, "missing");
5456  }
5457  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_MVCC_INFO),
5458  str_insid, str_delid);
5459  }
5460  }
5461  heap_scancache_end (thread_p, &scan_cache);
5462  }
5463  }
5464  break;
5465  default:
5466  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_UNKNOWN_TYPE));
5467  }
5468 
5469  /* dump total modes of holders and waiters */
5470  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_TOTAL_MODE),
5471  LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (res_ptr->total_holders_mode),
5472  LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (res_ptr->total_waiters_mode));
5473 
5474  num_holders = num_blocked_holders = 0;
5475  if (res_ptr->holder != NULL)
5476  {
5477  entry_ptr = res_ptr->holder;
5478  while (entry_ptr != NULL)
5479  {
5480  if (entry_ptr->blocked_mode == NULL_LOCK)
5481  {
5482  num_holders++;
5483  }
5484  else
5485  {
5486  num_blocked_holders++;
5487  }
5488  entry_ptr = entry_ptr->next;
5489  }
5490  }
5491  num_waiters = 0;
5492  if (res_ptr->waiter != NULL)
5493  {
5494  entry_ptr = res_ptr->waiter;
5495  while (entry_ptr != NULL)
5496  {
5497  num_waiters++;
5498  entry_ptr = entry_ptr->next;
5499  }
5500  }
5501 
5502  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_LOCK_COUNT), num_holders,
5503  num_blocked_holders, num_waiters);
5504 
5505  /* dump holders */
5506  if (num_holders > 0)
5507  {
5508  /* dump non blocked holders */
5509  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_NON_BLOCKED_HOLDER_HEAD));
5510  entry_ptr = res_ptr->holder;
5511  while (entry_ptr != NULL)
5512  {
5513  if (entry_ptr->blocked_mode == NULL_LOCK)
5514  {
5515  if (res_ptr->key.type == LOCK_RESOURCE_INSTANCE)
5516  {
5517  fprintf (outfp,
5518  msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK,
5519  MSGCAT_LK_RES_NON_BLOCKED_HOLDER_ENTRY), "", entry_ptr->tran_index,
5520  LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (entry_ptr->granted_mode), entry_ptr->count);
5521  }
5522  else
5523  {
5524  fprintf (outfp,
5525  msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK,
5526  MSGCAT_LK_RES_NON_BLOCKED_HOLDER_ENTRY_WITH_GRANULE), "",
5527  entry_ptr->tran_index, LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (entry_ptr->granted_mode), entry_ptr->count,
5528  entry_ptr->ngranules);
5529  }
5530  }
5531  entry_ptr = entry_ptr->next;
5532  }
5533  }
5534 
5535  if (num_blocked_holders > 0)
5536  {
5537  /* dump blocked holders */
5538  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_BLOCKED_HOLDER_HEAD));
5539  entry_ptr = res_ptr->holder;
5540  while (entry_ptr != NULL)
5541  {
5542  if (entry_ptr->blocked_mode != NULL_LOCK)
5543  {
5544  time_t stime = (time_t) (entry_ptr->thrd_entry->lockwait_stime / 1000LL);
5545  if (ctime_r (&stime, time_val) == NULL)
5546  {
5547  strcpy (time_val, "???");
5548  }
5549 
5550  time_str_len = strlen (time_val);
5551  if (time_str_len > 0 && time_val[time_str_len - 1] == '\n')
5552  {
5553  time_val[time_str_len - 1] = 0;
5554  }
5555  if (res_ptr->key.type == LOCK_RESOURCE_INSTANCE)
5556  {
5557  fprintf (outfp,
5558  msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_BLOCKED_HOLDER_ENTRY),
5559  "", entry_ptr->tran_index, LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (entry_ptr->granted_mode),
5560  entry_ptr->count, "", LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (entry_ptr->blocked_mode), "", time_val, "",
5561  lock_wait_msecs_to_secs (entry_ptr->thrd_entry->lockwait_msecs));
5562  }
5563  else
5564  {
5565  fprintf (outfp,
5566  msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK,
5567  MSGCAT_LK_RES_BLOCKED_HOLDER_ENTRY_WITH_GRANULE), "", entry_ptr->tran_index,
5568  LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (entry_ptr->granted_mode), entry_ptr->count, entry_ptr->ngranules,
5569  "", LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (entry_ptr->blocked_mode), "", time_val, "",
5570  lock_wait_msecs_to_secs (entry_ptr->thrd_entry->lockwait_msecs));
5571  }
5572  }
5573  entry_ptr = entry_ptr->next;
5574  }
5575  }
5576 
5577  /* dump blocked waiters */
5578  if (res_ptr->waiter != NULL)
5579  {
5580  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_BLOCKED_WAITER_HEAD));
5581  entry_ptr = res_ptr->waiter;
5582  while (entry_ptr != NULL)
5583  {
5584  time_t stime = (time_t) (entry_ptr->thrd_entry->lockwait_stime / 1000LL);
5585  (void) ctime_r (&stime, time_val);
5586 
5587  time_str_len = strlen (time_val);
5588  if (time_str_len > 0 && time_val[time_str_len - 1] == '\n')
5589  {
5590  time_val[time_str_len - 1] = 0;
5591  }
5592  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_BLOCKED_WAITER_ENTRY),
5593  "", entry_ptr->tran_index, LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (entry_ptr->blocked_mode), "", time_val, "",
5594  lock_wait_msecs_to_secs (entry_ptr->thrd_entry->lockwait_msecs));
5595  entry_ptr = entry_ptr->next;
5596  }
5597  }
5598 
5599  /* dump non two phase locks */
5600  if (res_ptr->non2pl != NULL)
5601  {
5602  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_NON2PL_RELEASED_HEAD));
5603  entry_ptr = res_ptr->non2pl;
5604  while (entry_ptr != NULL)
5605  {
5606  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_RES_NON2PL_RELEASED_ENTRY),
5607  "", entry_ptr->tran_index,
5608  ((entry_ptr->granted_mode == INCON_NON_TWO_PHASE_LOCK) ? "INCON_NON_TWO_PHASE_LOCK"
5609  : LOCK_TO_LOCKMODE_STRING (entry_ptr->granted_mode)));
5610  entry_ptr = entry_ptr->next;
5611  }
5612  }
5613  fprintf (outfp, msgcat_message (MSGCAT_CATALOG_CUBRID, MSGCAT_SET_LOCK, MSGCAT_LK_NEWLINE));
5614 
5615 }
5616 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
5617 
5618 #if defined(ENABLE_UNUSED_FUNCTION)
5619 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
5620 /*
5621  * lock_check_consistent_resource - Check if the lock resource entry is consistent
5622  *
5623  * return: true/false
5624  *
5625  * res_ptr(in):
5626  *
5627  * Note:Verify if a lock entry is consistent. At least one waiter must be
5628  * waiting on at least one transaction holding a lock, otherwise,
5629  * an inconsistent entry exist. Some waiters may be waiting on waiters.
5630  */
5631 static bool
5632 lock_check_consistent_resource (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, LK_RES * res_ptr)
5633 {
5634  LOCK total_mode;
5635  LK_ENTRY *i, *j;
5636  const char *msg_str;
5637  int rv;
5638 
5639  /* hold resource mutex */
5640  rv = pthread_mutex_lock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
5641 
5642  /* check total_holders_mode (total mode of lock holders) */
5643  total_mode = NULL_LOCK;
5644  for (i = res_ptr->holder; i != NULL; i = i->next)
5645  {
5646  assert (i->granted_mode >= NULL_LOCK && total_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
5647  total_mode = lock_Conv[i->granted_mode][total_mode];
5648  assert (total_mode != NA_LOCK);
5649 
5650  assert (i->blocked_mode >= NULL_LOCK && total_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
5651  total_mode = lock_Conv[i->blocked_mode][total_mode];
5652  assert (total_mode != NA_LOCK);
5653  }
5654  if (total_mode != res_ptr->total_holders_mode)
5655  {
5656  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: total mode of holders is inconsistent.";
5657  goto inconsistent;
5658  }
5659 
5660  /* check total_waiters_mode (total mode of lock waiters) */
5661  total_mode = NULL_LOCK;
5662  for (i = res_ptr->waiter; i != NULL; i = i->next)
5663  {
5664  assert (i->blocked_mode >= NULL_LOCK && total_mode >= NULL_LOCK);
5665  total_mode = lock_Conv[i->blocked_mode][total_mode];
5666  assert (total_mode != NA_LOCK);
5667  }
5668  if (total_mode != res_ptr->total_waiters_mode)
5669  {
5670  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: total mode of waiters is incons.";
5671  goto inconsistent;
5672  }
5673 
5674  /* check holders : lock information */
5675  for (i = res_ptr->holder; i != NULL; i = i->next)
5676  {
5677  /* check res_head */
5678  if (i->res_head != res_ptr)
5679  {
5680  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: res_head of a holder is incons.";
5681  goto inconsistent;
5682  }
5683  /* check tran_index */
5684  for (j = res_ptr->holder; j != NULL && j != i; j = j->next)
5685  {
5686  if (j->tran_index == i->tran_index)
5687  {
5688  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: tran_index of a holder is incons. (1)";
5689  goto inconsistent;
5690  }
5691  }
5692  for (j = res_ptr->waiter; j != NULL; j = j->next)
5693  {
5694  if (j->tran_index == i->tran_index)
5695  {
5696  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: tran_index of a holder is incons. (2)";
5697  goto inconsistent;
5698  }
5699  }
5700  for (j = res_ptr->non2pl; j != NULL; j = j->next)
5701  {
5702  if (j->tran_index == i->tran_index)
5703  {
5704  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: tran_index of a holder is incons. (3)";
5705  goto inconsistent;
5706  }
5707  }
5708  /* check thrd_entry */
5709  if (i->blocked_mode != NULL_LOCK)
5710  {
5711  if (i->thrd_entry == NULL)
5712  {
5713  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: thrd_entry of a blocked holder is incons.";
5714  goto inconsistent;
5715  }
5716  }
5717  }
5718 
5719  /* check lock waiters */
5720  for (i = res_ptr->waiter; i != NULL; i = i->next)
5721  {
5722  /* check res_head */
5723  if (i->res_head != res_ptr)
5724  {
5725  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: res_head of a waiter is incons.";
5726  goto inconsistent;
5727  }
5728  /* check tran_index */
5729  for (j = res_ptr->holder; j != NULL; j = j->next)
5730  {
5731  if (j->tran_index == i->tran_index)
5732  {
5733  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: tran_index of a waiter is incons. (1)";
5734  goto inconsistent;
5735  }
5736  }
5737  for (j = res_ptr->waiter; j != NULL && j != i; j = j->next)
5738  {
5739  if (j->tran_index == i->tran_index)
5740  {
5741  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: tran_index of a waiter is incons. (2)";
5742  goto inconsistent;
5743  }
5744  }
5745  for (j = res_ptr->non2pl; j != NULL; j = j->next)
5746  {
5747  if (j->tran_index == i->tran_index)
5748  {
5749  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: tran_index of a waiter is incons. (3)";
5750  goto inconsistent;
5751  }
5752  }
5753  /* check lock mode */
5754  if (i->blocked_mode == NULL_LOCK)
5755  {
5756  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: blocked_mode of a waiter is incons.";
5757  goto inconsistent;
5758  }
5759  /* check thrd_entry */
5760  if (i->thrd_entry == NULL)
5761  {
5762  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: thrd_entry of a waiter is incons.";
5763  goto inconsistent;
5764  }
5765  }
5766 
5767  /* check non2pl locks */
5768  for (i = res_ptr->non2pl; i != NULL; i = i->next)
5769  {
5770  /* check tran_index */
5771  for (j = res_ptr->holder; j != NULL; j = j->next)
5772  {
5773  if (j->tran_index == i->tran_index)
5774  {
5775  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: tran_index of a non2pl is incons. (1)";
5776  goto inconsistent;
5777  }
5778  }
5779  for (j = res_ptr->waiter; j != NULL; j = j->next)
5780  {
5781  if (j->tran_index == i->tran_index)
5782  {
5783  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: tran_index of a non2pl is incons. (2)";
5784  goto inconsistent;
5785  }
5786  }
5787  for (j = res_ptr->non2pl; j != NULL && j != i; j = j->next)
5788  {
5789  if (j->tran_index == i->tran_index)
5790  {
5791  msg_str = "lk_consistent_res: tran_index of a non2pl is incons. (3)";
5792  goto inconsistent;
5793  }
5794  }
5795  }
5796 
5797  /* consistent */
5798  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
5799  return true;
5800 
5801 inconsistent:
5802  lock_dump_resource (thread_p, stdout, res_ptr);
5803  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
5804  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, msg_str);
5805  return false;
5806 }
5807 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
5808 
5809 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
5810 /*
5811  * lock_check_consistent_tran_lock - Check consistency of transaction lock info entry
5812  *
5813  * return: true/false
5814  *
5815  * tran_lock(in): ponter to the transaction lock information entry
5816  *
5817  * Note:check if the given transaction lock information enrtry is consistent.
5818  */
5819 static bool
5820 lock_check_consistent_tran_lock (LK_TRAN_LOCK * tran_lock)
5821 {
5822  int count;
5823  LK_ENTRY *i;
5824  int rv;
5825 
5826  /* hold transaction hold mutex */
5827  rv = pthread_mutex_lock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
5828 
5829  /* check held locks */
5830  /* check inst_hold_count and class_hold_count */
5831  for (count = 0, i = tran_lock->inst_hold_list; i != NULL; i = i->tran_next)
5832  {
5833  count++;
5834  }
5835  if (count != tran_lock->inst_hold_count)
5836  {
5837  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
5838  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "lk_consistent_tran_lock: inst_hold_count incorrect.");
5839  return false;
5840  }
5841  for (count = 0, i = tran_lock->class_hold_list; i != NULL; i = i->tran_next)
5842  {
5843  count++;
5844  }
5845  if (count != tran_lock->class_hold_count)
5846  {
5847  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
5848  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "lk_consistent_tran_lock: class_hold_count incorrect.");
5849  return false;
5850  }
5851 
5852  /* release transaction hold mutex */
5853  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
5854 
5855  /* hold transaction non2pl mutex */
5856  rv = pthread_mutex_lock (&tran_lock->non2pl_mutex);
5857 
5858  /* check non2pl locks */
5859  /* check num_incons_non2pl */
5860  for (count = 0, i = tran_lock->non2pl_list; i != NULL; i = i->tran_next)
5861  {
5862  if (i->granted_mode == INCON_NON_TWO_PHASE_LOCK)
5863  {
5864  count++;
5865  }
5866  }
5867  if (count != tran_lock->num_incons_non2pl)
5868  {
5869  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->non2pl_mutex);
5870  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "lk_consistent_tran_lock: num_incons_non2pl incorrect.");
5871  return false;
5872  }
5873 
5874  /* release transactino non2pl mutex */
5875  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->non2pl_mutex);
5876 
5877  /* consistent */
5878  return true;
5879 }
5880 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
5881 #endif /* ENABLE_UNUSED_FUNCTION */
5882 
5883 /*
5884  * lock_initialize - Initialize the lock manager
5885  *
5886  * return: error code
5887  *
5888  * estimate_nobj_locks(in): estimate_nobj_locks(useless)
5889  *
5890  * Note:Initialize the lock manager memory structures.
5891  */
5892 int
5893 lock_initialize (void)
5894 {
5895 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
5896  lk_Standalone_has_xlock = false;
5897  return NO_ERROR;
5898 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
5899  const char *env_value;
5900  int error_code = NO_ERROR;
5901 
5902  error_code = lock_initialize_tran_lock_table ();
5903  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5904  {
5905  goto error;
5906  }
5907  error_code = lock_initialize_object_hash_table ();
5908  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5909  {
5910  goto error;
5911  }
5912  error_code = lock_initialize_object_lock_res_list ();
5913  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5914  {
5915  goto error;
5916  }
5917  error_code = lock_initialize_object_lock_entry_list ();
5918  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5919  {
5920  goto error;
5921  }
5922  error_code = lock_initialize_deadlock_detection ();
5923  if (error_code != NO_ERROR)
5924  {
5925  goto error;
5926  }
5927 
5928  /* initialize some parameters */
5929 #if defined(CUBRID_DEBUG)
5930  lk_Gl.verbose_mode = true;
5931  lk_Gl.no_victim_case_count = 0;
5932 #else /* !CUBRID_DEBUG */
5933  env_value = envvar_get ("LK_VERBOSE_SUSPENDED");
5934  if (env_value != NULL)
5935  {
5936  lk_Gl.verbose_mode = (bool) atoi (env_value);
5937  if (lk_Gl.verbose_mode != false)
5938  {
5939  lk_Gl.verbose_mode = true;
5940  }
5941  }
5942  lk_Gl.no_victim_case_count = 0;
5943 #endif /* !CUBRID_DEBUG */
5944 
5945 #if defined(LK_DUMP)
5946  lk_Gl.dump_level = 0;
5947  env_value = envvar_get ("LK_DUMP_LEVEL");
5948  if (env_value != NULL)
5949  {
5950  lk_Gl.dump_level = atoi (env_value);
5951  if (lk_Gl.dump_level < 0 || lk_Gl.dump_level > 3)
5952  {
5953  lk_Gl.dump_level = 0;
5954  }
5955  }
5956 #endif /* LK_DUMP */
5957 
5958  lock_deadlock_detect_daemon_init ();
5959 
5960  return error_code;
5961 
5962 error:
5963  (void) lock_finalize ();
5964  return error_code;
5965 #endif /* !SERVER_MODE */
5966 }
5967 
5968 // *INDENT-OFF*
5969 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
5970 
5971 //
5972 // lock_check_timeout_expired_and_count_suspended_mapfunc - function to map over all thread entries to find timed out
5973 // locks and suspended threads
5974 //
5975 // thread_ref (in) : thread entry
5976 // stop_mapper (out) : ignored
5977 // suspend_count (out) : count suspended threads
5978 //
5979 static void
5980 lock_check_timeout_expired_and_count_suspended_mapfunc (THREAD_ENTRY & thread_ref, bool & stop_mapper,
5981  size_t & suspend_count)
5982 {
5983  (void) stop_mapper; // suppress unused parameter warning
5984 
5985  // skip dead/free threads
5986  if (thread_ref.m_status == cubthread::entry::status::TS_DEAD
5987  || thread_ref.m_status == cubthread::entry::status::TS_FREE)
5988  {
5989  return;
5990  }
5991  if (thread_ref.lockwait == NULL)
5992  {
5993  return;
5994  }
5995  // suspended thread
5996 
5997  /* The transaction, for which the current thread is working, might be interrupted.
5998  * lock_force_timeout_expired_wait_transactions() performs not only interrupt but timeout checking.
5999  */
6000  if (!lock_force_timeout_expired_wait_transactions (&thread_ref))
6001  {
6002  // not timed out. count as suspended
6003  suspend_count++;
6004  }
6005 }
6006 
6007 // class deadlock_detect_task
6008 //
6009 // description:
6010 // deadlock detect daemon task
6011 // It does
6012 // (1) to resume an interrupted lock waiter
6013 // (2) to resume a timedout lock waiter
6014 // (3) to detect and resolve a deadlock.
6015 // It operates (1) and (2) for every 100ms and does (3) for every PRM_ID_LK_RUN_DEADLOCK_INTERVAL.
6016 //
6017 class deadlock_detect_task : public cubthread::entry_task
6018 {
6019  public:
6020  void execute (cubthread::entry & thread_ref) override
6021  {
6022  if (!BO_IS_SERVER_RESTARTED ())
6023  {
6024  // wait for boot to finish
6025  return;
6026  }
6027 
6028  if (lk_Gl.deadlock_and_timeout_detector == 0)
6029  {
6030  // if none of the threads were suspended then just return
6031  return;
6032  }
6033 
6034  /* check if the lock-wait thread exists */
6035  size_t lock_wait_count = 0;
6036  thread_get_manager ()->map_entries (lock_check_timeout_expired_and_count_suspended_mapfunc, lock_wait_count);
6037 
6038  if (lock_is_local_deadlock_detection_interval_up () && lock_wait_count >= 2)
6039  {
6040  lock_detect_local_deadlock (&thread_ref);
6041  }
6042  }
6043 };
6044 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
6045 
6046 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
6047 /*
6048  * lock_deadlock_detect_daemon_init () - initialize deadlock detect daemon thread
6049  */
6050 void
6051 lock_deadlock_detect_daemon_init ()
6052 {
6053  assert (lock_Deadlock_detect_daemon == NULL);
6054 
6055  cubthread::looper looper = cubthread::looper (std::chrono::milliseconds (100));
6056  deadlock_detect_task *daemon_task = new deadlock_detect_task ();
6057 
6058  // create deadlock detect daemon thread
6059  lock_Deadlock_detect_daemon = cubthread::get_manager ()->create_daemon (looper, daemon_task, "lock_deadlock_detect");
6060 }
6061 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
6062 
6063 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
6064 /*
6065  * lock_deadlock_detect_daemon_destroy () - destroy deadlock detect daemon thread
6066  */
6067 void
6068 lock_deadlock_detect_daemon_destroy ()
6069 {
6070  cubthread::get_manager ()->destroy_daemon (lock_Deadlock_detect_daemon);
6071 }
6072 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
6073 
6074 #if defined(SERVER_MODE)
6075 /*
6076  * lock_deadlock_detect_daemon_get_stats - get deadlock detector daemon thread statistics into statsp
6077  */
6078 void
6079 lock_deadlock_detect_daemon_get_stats (UINT64 * statsp)
6080 {
6081  if (lock_Deadlock_detect_daemon != NULL)
6082  {
6083  lock_Deadlock_detect_daemon->get_stats (statsp);
6084  }
6085 }
6086 #endif /* SERVER_MODE */
6087 // *INDENT-ON*
6088 
6089 /*
6090  * lock_finalize - Finalize the lock manager
6091  *
6092  * return: nothing
6093  *
6094  * Note:This function finalize the lock manager.
6095  * Memory structures of the lock manager are deallocated.
6096  */
6097 void
6098 lock_finalize (void)
6099 {
6100 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
6101  lk_Standalone_has_xlock = false;
6102 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
6103  LK_TRAN_LOCK *tran_lock;
6104  int i;
6105 
6106  /* Release all the locks and awake all transactions */
6107  /* TODO: Why ? */
6108  /* transaction deadlock information table */
6109  /* deallocate memory space for the transaction deadlock info. */
6110  if (lk_Gl.TWFG_node != NULL)
6111  {
6112  free_and_init (lk_Gl.TWFG_node);
6113  }
6114 
6115  /* transaction lock information table */
6116  /* deallocate memory space for transaction lock table */
6117  if (lk_Gl.tran_lock_table != NULL)
6118  {
6119  for (i = 0; i < lk_Gl.num_trans; i++)
6120  {
6121  tran_lock = &lk_Gl.tran_lock_table[i];
6122  pthread_mutex_destroy (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
6123  pthread_mutex_destroy (&tran_lock->non2pl_mutex);
6124  while (tran_lock->lk_entry_pool != NULL)
6125  {
6126  LK_ENTRY *entry = tran_lock->lk_entry_pool;
6127  tran_lock->lk_entry_pool = tran_lock->lk_entry_pool->next;
6128  free (entry);
6129  }
6130  }
6131  free_and_init (lk_Gl.tran_lock_table);
6132  }
6133  /* reset the number of transactions */
6134  lk_Gl.num_trans = 0;
6135  pthread_mutex_destroy (&lk_Gl.DL_detection_mutex);
6136 
6137  /* reset max number of object locks */
6138  lk_Gl.max_obj_locks = 0;
6139 
6140  /* destroy hash table and freelists */
6141  lf_hash_destroy (&lk_Gl.obj_hash_table);
6142  lf_freelist_destroy (&lk_Gl.obj_free_entry_list);
6143  lf_freelist_destroy (&lk_Gl.obj_free_res_list);
6144 
6145  lock_deadlock_detect_daemon_destroy ();
6146 #endif /* !SERVER_MODE */
6147 }
6148 
6149 /*
6150  * lock_hold_object_instant - Hold object lock with instant duration
6151  *
6152  * return: one of following values
6153  * LK_GRANTED
6154  * LK_NOTGRANTED
6155  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR
6156  *
6157  * oid(in):
6158  * class_oid(in):
6159  * lock(in):
6160  */
6161 int
6162 lock_hold_object_instant (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, const OID * oid, const OID * class_oid, LOCK lock)
6163 {
6164 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
6165  LK_SET_STANDALONE_XLOCK (lock);
6166  return LK_GRANTED;
6167 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
6168  int tran_index;
6169  if (oid == NULL)
6170  {
6171  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lk_object_instant", "NULL OID pointer");
6172  return LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
6173  }
6174  if (class_oid == NULL)
6175  {
6176  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lk_object_instant", "NULL ClassOID pointer");
6177  return LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
6178  }
6179  if (lock == NULL_LOCK)
6180  {
6181  return LK_GRANTED;
6182  }
6183 
6184  tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p);
6185  return lock_internal_hold_lock_object_instant (thread_p, tran_index, oid, class_oid, lock);
6186 
6187 #endif /* !SERVER_MODE */
6188 }
6189 
6190 /*
6191  * lock_object - Lock an object
6192  *
6193  * return: one of following values)
6194  * LK_GRANTED
6195  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ABORTED
6196  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_TIMEOUT
6197  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR
6198  *
6199  * oid(in): Identifier of object(instance, class, root class) to lock
6200  * class_oid(in): Identifier of the class instance of the given object
6201  * lock(in): Requested lock mode
6202  * cond_flag(in):
6203  *
6204  */
6205 int
6206 lock_object (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, const OID * oid, const OID * class_oid, LOCK lock, int cond_flag)
6207 {
6208 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
6209  LK_SET_STANDALONE_XLOCK (lock);
6210  return LK_GRANTED;
6211 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
6212  int tran_index;
6213  int wait_msecs;
6214  TRAN_ISOLATION isolation;
6215  LOCK new_class_lock;
6216  LOCK old_class_lock;
6217  int granted;
6218  LK_ENTRY *root_class_entry = NULL;
6219  LK_ENTRY *class_entry = NULL, *superclass_entry = NULL;
6220  LK_ENTRY *inst_entry = NULL;
6221 #if defined (EnableThreadMonitoring)
6222  TSC_TICKS start_tick, end_tick;
6223  TSCTIMEVAL elapsed_time;
6224 #endif
6225 
6226  if (oid == NULL)
6227  {
6228  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lock_object", "NULL OID pointer");
6229  return LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
6230  }
6231  if (class_oid == NULL)
6232  {
6233  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lock_object", "NULL ClassOID pointer");
6234  return LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
6235  }
6236 
6237  if (lock == NULL_LOCK)
6238  {
6239  return LK_GRANTED;
6240  }
6241 
6242 #if defined (EnableThreadMonitoring)
6243  if (0 < prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_MNT_WAITING_THREAD))
6244  {
6245  tsc_getticks (&start_tick);
6246  }
6247 #endif
6248 
6249  tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p);
6250  if (cond_flag == LK_COND_LOCK) /* conditional request */
6251  {
6252  wait_msecs = LK_FORCE_ZERO_WAIT;
6253  }
6254  else
6255  {
6256  wait_msecs = logtb_find_wait_msecs (tran_index);
6257  }
6258  isolation = logtb_find_isolation (tran_index);
6259 
6260  /* check if the given oid is root class oid */
6261  if (OID_IS_ROOTOID (oid))
6262  {
6263  /* case 1 : resource type is LOCK_RESOURCE_ROOT_CLASS acquire a lock on the root class oid. NOTE that in case of
6264  * acquiring a lock on a class object, the higher lock granule of the class object must not be given. */
6265  granted = lock_internal_perform_lock_object (thread_p, tran_index, oid, NULL, lock, wait_msecs,
6266  &root_class_entry, NULL);
6267  goto end;
6268  }
6269 
6270  /* get the intentional lock mode to be acquired on class oid */
6271  if (lock <= S_LOCK)
6272  {
6273  new_class_lock = IS_LOCK;
6274  }
6275  else
6276  {
6277  new_class_lock = IX_LOCK;
6278  }
6279 
6280  /* Check if current transaction has already held the class lock. If the class lock is not held, hold the class lock,
6281  * now. */
6282  class_entry = lock_get_class_lock (thread_p, class_oid, tran_index);
6283  old_class_lock = (class_entry) ? class_entry->granted_mode : NULL_LOCK;
6284 
6285  if (OID_IS_ROOTOID (class_oid))
6286  {
6287  if (old_class_lock < new_class_lock)
6288  {
6289  granted = lock_internal_perform_lock_object (thread_p, tran_index, class_oid, NULL, new_class_lock,
6290  wait_msecs, &root_class_entry, NULL);
6291  if (granted != LK_GRANTED)
6292  {
6293  goto end;
6294  }
6295  }
6296  /* case 2 : resource type is LOCK_RESOURCE_CLASS */
6297  /* acquire a lock on the given class object */
6298 
6299  /* NOTE that in case of acquiring a lock on a class object, the higher lock granule of the class object must not
6300  * be given. */
6301  granted = lock_internal_perform_lock_object (thread_p, tran_index, oid, NULL, lock, wait_msecs, &class_entry,
6302  root_class_entry);
6303  goto end;
6304  }
6305  else
6306  {
6307  if (old_class_lock < new_class_lock)
6308  {
6309  if (class_entry != NULL && class_entry->class_entry != NULL
6310  && !OID_IS_ROOTOID (&class_entry->class_entry->res_head->key.oid))
6311  {
6312  /* preserve class hierarchy */
6313  superclass_entry = class_entry->class_entry;
6314  }
6315  else
6316  {
6317  superclass_entry = lock_get_class_lock (thread_p, oid_Root_class_oid, tran_index);
6318  }
6319 
6320  granted =
6321  lock_internal_perform_lock_object (thread_p, tran_index, class_oid, NULL, new_class_lock, wait_msecs,
6322  &class_entry, superclass_entry);
6323  if (granted != LK_GRANTED)
6324  {
6325  goto end;
6326  }
6327  }
6328 
6329  /* case 3 : resource type is LOCK_RESOURCE_INSTANCE */
6330  if (lock_is_class_lock_escalated (old_class_lock, lock) == true)
6331  { /* already granted on the class level */
6332  /* if incompatible old class lock with requested lock, remove instant class locks */
6333  lock_stop_instant_lock_mode (thread_p, tran_index, false);
6334  granted = LK_GRANTED;
6335  goto end;
6336  }
6337  /* acquire a lock on the given instance oid */
6338 
6339  /* NOTE that in case of acquiring a lock on an instance object, the class oid of the instance object must be
6340  * given. */
6341  granted = lock_internal_perform_lock_object (thread_p, tran_index, oid, class_oid, lock, wait_msecs, &inst_entry,
6342  class_entry);
6343  goto end;
6344  }
6345 
6346 end:
6347 #if defined (EnableThreadMonitoring)
6348  if (0 < prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_MNT_WAITING_THREAD))
6349  {
6350  tsc_getticks (&end_tick);
6351  tsc_elapsed_time_usec (&elapsed_time, end_tick, start_tick);
6352  }
6353  if (MONITOR_WAITING_THREAD (elapsed_time))
6354  {
6355  er_set (ER_NOTIFICATION_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_MNT_WAITING_THREAD, 2, "lock object (lock_object)",
6356  prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_MNT_WAITING_THREAD));
6357  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "lock_object: %6d.%06d\n", elapsed_time.tv_sec, elapsed_time.tv_usec);
6358  }
6359 #endif
6360 
6361  return granted;
6362 #endif /* !SERVER_MODE */
6363 }
6364 
6365 /*
6366  * lock_subclass () - Lock a class in a class hierarchy
6367  *
6368  * return: one of following values)
6369  * LK_GRANTED
6370  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ABORTED
6371  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_TIMEOUT
6372  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR
6373  *
6374  * subclass_oid(in): Identifier of subclass to lock
6375  * superclass_oid(in): Identifier of the superclass
6376  * lock(in): Requested lock mode
6377  * cond_flag(in):
6378  */
6379 int
6380 lock_subclass (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, const OID * subclass_oid, const OID * superclass_oid, LOCK lock, int cond_flag)
6381 {
6382 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
6383  LK_SET_STANDALONE_XLOCK (lock);
6384  return LK_GRANTED;
6385 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
6386  LOCK new_superclass_lock, old_superclass_lock;
6387  LK_ENTRY *superclass_entry = NULL, *subclass_entry = NULL;
6388  int granted;
6389  int tran_index;
6390  int wait_msecs;
6391  TRAN_ISOLATION isolation;
6392 #if defined (EnableThreadMonitoring)
6393  TSC_TICKS start_tick, end_tick;
6394  TSCTIMEVAL elapsed_time;
6395 #endif
6396 
6397  if (subclass_oid == NULL)
6398  {
6399  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lock_subclass", "NULL subclass OID pointer");
6400  return LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
6401  }
6402 
6403  if (superclass_oid == NULL)
6404  {
6405  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lock_subclass", "NULL superclass OID pointer");
6406  return LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
6407  }
6408 
6409  if (lock == NULL_LOCK)
6410  {
6411  return LK_GRANTED;
6412  }
6413 
6414 #if defined (EnableThreadMonitoring)
6415  if (0 < prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_MNT_WAITING_THREAD))
6416  {
6417  tsc_getticks (&start_tick);
6418  }
6419 #endif
6420 
6421  tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p);
6422  if (cond_flag == LK_COND_LOCK) /* conditional request */
6423  {
6424  wait_msecs = LK_FORCE_ZERO_WAIT;
6425  }
6426  else
6427  {
6428  wait_msecs = logtb_find_wait_msecs (tran_index);
6429  }
6430  isolation = logtb_find_isolation (tran_index);
6431 
6432  /* get the intentional lock mode to be acquired on class oid */
6433  if (lock <= S_LOCK)
6434  {
6435  new_superclass_lock = IS_LOCK;
6436  }
6437  else
6438  {
6439  new_superclass_lock = IX_LOCK;
6440  }
6441 
6442  /* Check if current transaction has already held the class lock. If the class lock is not held, hold the class lock,
6443  * now. */
6444  superclass_entry = lock_get_class_lock (thread_p, superclass_oid, tran_index);
6445  old_superclass_lock = (superclass_entry) ? superclass_entry->granted_mode : NULL_LOCK;
6446 
6447 
6448  if (old_superclass_lock < new_superclass_lock)
6449  {
6450  /* superclass is already locked, just promote to the new lock */
6451  granted = lock_internal_perform_lock_object (thread_p, tran_index, superclass_oid, NULL, new_superclass_lock,
6452  wait_msecs, &superclass_entry, NULL);
6453  if (granted != LK_GRANTED)
6454  {
6455  goto end;
6456  }
6457  }
6458  /* case 2 : resource type is LOCK_RESOURCE_CLASS */
6459  /* acquire a lock on the given class object */
6460 
6461  /* NOTE that in case of acquiring a lock on a class object, the higher lock granule of the class object must not be
6462  * given. */
6463 
6464  granted = lock_internal_perform_lock_object (thread_p, tran_index, subclass_oid, NULL, lock, wait_msecs,
6465  &subclass_entry, superclass_entry);
6466 end:
6467 #if defined (EnableThreadMonitoring)
6468  if (0 < prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_MNT_WAITING_THREAD))
6469  {
6470  tsc_getticks (&end_tick);
6471  tsc_elapsed_time_usec (&elapsed_time, end_tick, start_tick);
6472  }
6473  if (MONITOR_WAITING_THREAD (elapsed_time))
6474  {
6475  er_set (ER_NOTIFICATION_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_MNT_WAITING_THREAD, 2, "lock object (lock_object)",
6476  prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_MNT_WAITING_THREAD));
6477  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "lock_object: %6d.%06d\n", elapsed_time.tv_sec, elapsed_time.tv_usec);
6478  }
6479 #endif
6480 
6481  return granted;
6482 #endif /* !SERVER_MODE */
6483 }
6484 
6485 /*
6486  * lock_object_wait_msecs - Lock an object
6487  *
6488  * return: one of following values)
6489  * LK_GRANTED
6490  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ABORTED
6491  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_TIMEOUT
6492  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR
6493  *
6494  * oid(in): Identifier of object(instance, class, root class) to lock
6495  * class_oid(in): Identifier of the class instance of the given object
6496  * lock(in): Requested lock mode
6497  * cond_flag(in):
6498  * wait_msecs(in):
6499  *
6500  */
6501 int
6502 lock_object_wait_msecs (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, const OID * oid, const OID * class_oid, LOCK lock, int cond_flag,
6503  int wait_msecs)
6504 {
6505 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
6506  LK_SET_STANDALONE_XLOCK (lock);
6507  return LK_GRANTED;
6508 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
6509  int old_wait_msecs = xlogtb_reset_wait_msecs (thread_p, wait_msecs);
6510  int lock_result = lock_object (thread_p, oid, class_oid, lock, cond_flag);
6511 
6512  xlogtb_reset_wait_msecs (thread_p, old_wait_msecs);
6513 
6514  return lock_result;
6515 #endif
6516 }
6517 
6518 /*
6519  * lock_scan - Lock for scanning a heap
6520  *
6521  * return: one of following values)
6522  * LK_GRANTED
6523  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ABORTED
6524  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_TIMEOUT
6525  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR
6526  *
6527  * class_oid(in): class oid of the instances to be scanned
6528  * current_lock(in): acquired lock
6529  *
6530  */
6531 int
6532 lock_scan (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, const OID * class_oid, int cond_flag, LOCK class_lock)
6533 {
6534 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
6535  return LK_GRANTED;
6536 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
6537  int tran_index;
6538  int wait_msecs;
6539  TRAN_ISOLATION isolation;
6540  int granted;
6541  LK_ENTRY *root_class_entry = NULL;
6542  LK_ENTRY *class_entry = NULL;
6543 #if defined (EnableThreadMonitoring)
6544  TSC_TICKS start_tick, end_tick;
6545  TSCTIMEVAL elapsed_time;
6546 #endif
6547 
6548  if (class_oid == NULL)
6549  {
6550  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lock_scan", "NULL ClassOID pointer");
6551  return LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
6552  }
6553 
6554 #if defined (EnableThreadMonitoring)
6555  if (0 < prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_MNT_WAITING_THREAD))
6556  {
6557  tsc_getticks (&start_tick);
6558  }
6559 #endif
6560 
6561  tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p);
6562  if (cond_flag == LK_COND_LOCK)
6563  {
6564  wait_msecs = LK_FORCE_ZERO_WAIT;
6565  }
6566  else
6567  {
6568  assert (cond_flag == LK_UNCOND_LOCK);
6569  wait_msecs = logtb_find_wait_msecs (tran_index);
6570  }
6571  isolation = logtb_find_isolation (tran_index);
6572 
6573  /* acquire the lock on the class */
6574  /* NOTE that in case of acquiring a lock on a class object, the higher lock granule of the class object is not given. */
6575  root_class_entry = lock_get_class_lock (thread_p, oid_Root_class_oid, tran_index);
6576  granted = lock_internal_perform_lock_object (thread_p, tran_index, class_oid, NULL, class_lock, wait_msecs,
6577  &class_entry, root_class_entry);
6578  assert (granted == LK_GRANTED || cond_flag == LK_COND_LOCK || er_errid () != NO_ERROR);
6579 
6580 #if defined (EnableThreadMonitoring)
6581  if (0 < prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_MNT_WAITING_THREAD))
6582  {
6583  tsc_getticks (&end_tick);
6584  tsc_elapsed_time_usec (&elapsed_time, end_tick, start_tick);
6585  }
6586  if (MONITOR_WAITING_THREAD (elapsed_time))
6587  {
6588  er_set (ER_NOTIFICATION_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_MNT_WAITING_THREAD, 2, "lock object (lock_scan)",
6589  prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_MNT_WAITING_THREAD));
6590  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "lock_scan: %6d.%06d\n", elapsed_time.tv_sec, elapsed_time.tv_usec);
6591  }
6592 #endif
6593 
6594  return granted;
6595 #endif /* !SERVER_MODE */
6596 }
6597 
6598 /*
6599  * lock_classes_lock_hint - Lock many classes that has been hinted
6600  *
6601  * return: one of following values
6602  * LK_GRANTED
6603  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ABORTED
6604  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_TIMEOUT
6605  * LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR
6606  *
6607  * lockhint(in): description of hinted classes
6608  *
6609  */
6610 int
6611 lock_classes_lock_hint (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, LC_LOCKHINT * lockhint)
6612 {
6613 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
6614  int i;
6615 
6616  for (i = 0; i < lockhint->num_classes; i++)
6617  {
6618  if (lockhint->classes[i].lock == SCH_M_LOCK || lockhint->classes[i].lock == X_LOCK
6619  || lockhint->classes[i].lock == IX_LOCK || lockhint->classes[i].lock == SIX_LOCK)
6620  {
6621  lk_Standalone_has_xlock = true;
6622  break;
6623  }
6624  }
6625  return LK_GRANTED;
6626 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
6627  int tran_index;
6628  int wait_msecs;
6629  TRAN_ISOLATION isolation;
6630  LK_LOCKINFO cls_lockinfo_space[LK_LOCKINFO_FIXED_COUNT];
6631  LK_LOCKINFO *cls_lockinfo;
6632  LK_ENTRY *root_class_entry = NULL;
6633  LK_ENTRY *class_entry = NULL;
6634  OID *root_oidp;
6635  LOCK root_lock;
6636  LOCK intention_mode;
6637  int cls_count;
6638  int granted, i;
6639 #if defined (EnableThreadMonitoring)
6640  TSC_TICKS start_tick, end_tick;
6641  TSCTIMEVAL elapsed_time;
6642 #endif
6643 
6644  if (lockhint == NULL)
6645  {
6646  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lock_classes_lock_hint",
6647  "NULL lockhint pointer");
6648  return LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
6649  }
6650 
6651  /* If there is nothing to lock, returns */
6652  if (lockhint->num_classes <= 0)
6653  {
6654  return LK_GRANTED;
6655  }
6656 
6657 #if defined (EnableThreadMonitoring)
6658  if (0 < prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_MNT_WAITING_THREAD))
6659  {
6660  tsc_getticks (&start_tick);
6661  }
6662 #endif
6663 
6664  tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p);
6665  wait_msecs = logtb_find_wait_msecs (tran_index);
6666  isolation = logtb_find_isolation (tran_index);
6667 
6668  /* We do not want to rollback the transaction in the event of a deadlock. For now, let's just wait a long time. If
6669  * deadlock, the transaction is going to be notified of lock timeout instead of aborted. */
6670  if (lockhint->quit_on_errors == false && wait_msecs == LK_INFINITE_WAIT)
6671  {
6672  wait_msecs = INT_MAX; /* to be notified of lock timeout */
6673  }
6674 
6675  /* prepare cls_lockinfo array */
6676  if (lockhint->num_classes <= LK_LOCKINFO_FIXED_COUNT)
6677  {
6678  cls_lockinfo = &cls_lockinfo_space[0];
6679  }
6680  else
6681  { /* num_classes > LK_LOCKINFO_FIXED_COUNT */
6682  cls_lockinfo = (LK_LOCKINFO *) db_private_alloc (thread_p, SIZEOF_LK_LOCKINFO * lockhint->num_classes);
6683  if (cls_lockinfo == NULL)
6684  {
6685  return LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_ERROR;
6686  }
6687  }
6688 
6689  /* Define the desired locks for all classes */
6690  /* get class_oids and class_locks */
6691  cls_count = 0;
6692  for (i = 0; i < lockhint->num_classes; i++)
6693  {
6694  if (OID_ISNULL (&lockhint->classes[i].oid) || lockhint->classes[i].lock == NULL_LOCK)
6695  {
6696  continue;
6697  }
6698 
6699  if (OID_IS_ROOTOID (&lockhint->classes[i].oid))
6700  {
6701  /* When the given class is the root class */
6702  root_oidp = &lockhint->classes[i].oid;
6703  root_lock = lockhint->classes[i].lock;
6704 
6705  /* hold an explicit lock on the root class */
6706  granted = lock_internal_perform_lock_object (thread_p, tran_index, root_oidp, NULL, root_lock, wait_msecs,
6707  &root_class_entry, NULL);
6708  if (granted != LK_GRANTED)
6709  {
6710  if (lockhint->quit_on_errors == (int) true || granted != LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_TIMEOUT)
6711  {
6712  goto error;
6713  }
6714  else
6715  {
6716  OID_SET_NULL (root_oidp);
6717  }
6718  }
6719  }
6720  else
6721  {
6722  /* build cls_lockinfo[cls_count] */
6723  COPY_OID (&cls_lockinfo[cls_count].oid, &lockhint->classes[i].oid);
6724  cls_lockinfo[cls_count].org_oidp = &lockhint->classes[i].oid;
6725  cls_lockinfo[cls_count].lock = lockhint->classes[i].lock;
6726 
6727  /* increment cls_count */
6728  cls_count++;
6729  }
6730  }
6731 
6732  /* sort class oids before hold the locks in order to avoid deadlocks */
6733  if (cls_count > 1)
6734  {
6735  (void) qsort (cls_lockinfo, cls_count, SIZEOF_LK_LOCKINFO, lock_compare_lock_info);
6736  }
6737 
6738  /* get root class lock mode */
6739  root_class_entry = lock_get_class_lock (thread_p, oid_Root_class_oid, tran_index);
6740 
6741  for (i = 0; i < cls_count; i++)
6742  {
6743  /* hold the intentional lock on the root class if needed. */
6744  if (cls_lockinfo[i].lock <= S_LOCK)
6745  {
6746  intention_mode = IS_LOCK;
6747  }
6748  else
6749  {
6750  intention_mode = IX_LOCK;
6751  }
6752 
6753  if (root_class_entry == NULL || root_class_entry->granted_mode < intention_mode)
6754  {
6755  granted = lock_internal_perform_lock_object (thread_p, tran_index, oid_Root_class_oid, NULL, intention_mode,
6756  wait_msecs, &root_class_entry, NULL);
6757  if (granted != LK_GRANTED)
6758  {
6759  if (lockhint->quit_on_errors == false && granted == LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_TIMEOUT)
6760  {
6761  OID_SET_NULL (cls_lockinfo[i].org_oidp);
6762  continue;
6763  }
6764  goto error;
6765  }
6766  }
6767 
6768  /* hold the lock on the given class. */
6769  granted = lock_internal_perform_lock_object (thread_p, tran_index, &cls_lockinfo[i].oid, NULL,
6770  cls_lockinfo[i].lock, wait_msecs, &class_entry, root_class_entry);
6771 
6772  if (granted != LK_GRANTED)
6773  {
6774  if (lockhint->quit_on_errors == false && granted == LK_NOTGRANTED_DUE_TIMEOUT)
6775  {
6776  OID_SET_NULL (cls_lockinfo[i].org_oidp);
6777  continue;
6778  }
6779  goto error;
6780  }
6781  }
6782 
6783  /* release memory space for cls_lockinfo */
6784  if (cls_lockinfo != &cls_lockinfo_space[0])
6785  {
6786  db_private_free_and_init (thread_p, cls_lockinfo);
6787  }
6788 
6789 #if defined (EnableThreadMonitoring)
6790  if (0 < prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_MNT_WAITING_THREAD))
6791  {
6792  tsc_getticks (&end_tick);
6793  tsc_elapsed_time_usec (&elapsed_time, end_tick, start_tick);
6794  }
6795  if (MONITOR_WAITING_THREAD (elapsed_time))
6796  {
6797  er_set (ER_NOTIFICATION_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_MNT_WAITING_THREAD, 2, "lock object (lock_classes_lock_hint)",
6798  prm_get_integer_value (PRM_ID_MNT_WAITING_THREAD));
6799  er_log_debug (ARG_FILE_LINE, "lock_classes_lock_hint: %6d.%06d\n", elapsed_time.tv_sec, elapsed_time.tv_usec);
6800  }
6801 #endif
6802 
6803  return LK_GRANTED;
6804 
6805 error:
6806  if (cls_lockinfo != &cls_lockinfo_space[0])
6807  {
6808  db_private_free_and_init (thread_p, cls_lockinfo);
6809  }
6810  return granted;
6811 #endif /* !SERVER_MODE */
6812 }
6813 
6814 static void
6815 lock_unlock_object_lock_internal (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, const OID * oid, const OID * class_oid, LOCK lock,
6816  int release_flag, int move_to_non2pl)
6817 {
6818 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
6819  return;
6820 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
6821  LK_ENTRY *entry_ptr = NULL;
6822  int tran_index;
6823  bool is_class;
6824 
6825  is_class = (OID_IS_ROOTOID (oid) || OID_IS_ROOTOID (class_oid)) ? true : false;
6826 
6827  /* get transaction table index */
6828  tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p);
6829  entry_ptr = lock_find_tran_hold_entry (thread_p, tran_index, oid, is_class);
6830 
6831  if (entry_ptr != NULL)
6832  {
6833  lock_internal_perform_unlock_object (thread_p, entry_ptr, release_flag, move_to_non2pl);
6834  }
6835 #endif
6836 }
6837 
6838 /*
6839  * lock_unlock_object_donot_move_to_non2pl - Unlock an object lock on the specified object
6840  * return:
6841  * thread_p(in):
6842  * oid(in): Identifier of instance to unlock from
6843  * class_oid(in): Identifier of the class of the instance
6844  * lock(in): Lock to release
6845  *
6846  */
6847 void
6848 lock_unlock_object_donot_move_to_non2pl (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, const OID * oid, const OID * class_oid, LOCK lock)
6849 {
6850  lock_unlock_object_lock_internal (thread_p, oid, class_oid, lock, false, false);
6851 }
6852 
6853 /*
6854  * lock_remove_object_lock - Removes a lock on the specified object
6855  * return:
6856  * thread_p(in):
6857  * oid(in): Identifier of instance to remove lock from
6858  * class_oid(in): Identifier of the class of the instance
6859  * lock(in): Lock to remove
6860  *
6861  */
6862 void
6863 lock_remove_object_lock (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, const OID * oid, const OID * class_oid, LOCK lock)
6864 {
6865  lock_unlock_object_lock_internal (thread_p, oid, class_oid, lock, true, false);
6866 }
6867 
6868 /*
6869  * lock_unlock_object - Unlock an object according to transaction isolation level
6870  *
6871  * return: nothing..
6872  *
6873  * oid(in): Identifier of instance to lock
6874  * class_oid(in): Identifier of the class of the instance
6875  * lock(in): Lock to release
6876  * force(in): Unlock the object no matter what it is the isolation level.
6877  *
6878  */
6879 void
6880 lock_unlock_object (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, const OID * oid, const OID * class_oid, LOCK lock, bool force)
6881 {
6882 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
6883  return;
6884 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
6885  int tran_index; /* transaction table index */
6886  TRAN_ISOLATION isolation; /* transaction isolation level */
6887  LK_ENTRY *entry_ptr;
6888  bool is_class;
6889 
6890  if (oid == NULL)
6891  {
6892  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lk_unlock_object", "NULL OID pointer");
6893  return;
6894  }
6895  if (class_oid == NULL)
6896  {
6897  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lk_unlock_object", "NULL ClassOID pointer");
6898  return;
6899  }
6900 
6901  is_class = (OID_IS_ROOTOID (oid) || OID_IS_ROOTOID (class_oid)) ? true : false;
6902 
6903  /* get transaction table index */
6904  tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p);
6905 
6906  if (force == true)
6907  {
6908 #if defined(ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP)
6909  CUBRID_LOCK_RELEASE_START (oid, class_oid, lock);
6910 #endif /* ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP */
6911 
6912  entry_ptr = lock_find_tran_hold_entry (thread_p, tran_index, oid, is_class);
6913 
6914  if (entry_ptr != NULL)
6915  {
6916  lock_internal_perform_unlock_object (thread_p, entry_ptr, false, true);
6917  }
6918 
6919 #if defined(ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP)
6920  CUBRID_LOCK_RELEASE_END (oid, class_oid, lock);
6921 #endif /* ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP */
6922 
6923  return;
6924  }
6925 
6926  /* force != true */
6927  if (lock != S_LOCK)
6928  {
6929  assert (lock != NULL_LOCK);
6930  /* These will not be released. */
6931  return;
6932  }
6933 
6934  isolation = logtb_find_isolation (tran_index);
6935  switch (isolation)
6936  {
6937  case TRAN_SERIALIZABLE:
6938  case TRAN_REPEATABLE_READ:
6939  return; /* nothing to do */
6940 
6941  case TRAN_READ_COMMITTED:
6942 #if defined(ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP)
6943  CUBRID_LOCK_RELEASE_START (oid, class_oid, lock);
6944 #endif /* ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP */
6945 
6946  /* The intentional lock on the higher lock granule must be kept. */
6947  lock_unlock_object_by_isolation (thread_p, tran_index, isolation, class_oid, oid);
6948 
6949 #if defined(ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP)
6950  CUBRID_LOCK_RELEASE_END (oid, class_oid, lock);
6951 #endif /* ENABLE_SYSTEMTAP */
6952  break;
6953 
6954  default: /* TRAN_UNKNOWN_ISOLATION */
6955  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_UNKNOWN_ISOLATION, 2, isolation, tran_index);
6956  break;
6957  }
6958 
6959  return;
6960 #endif /* !SERVER_MODE */
6961 }
6962 
6963 /*
6964  * lock_unlock_objects_lock_set - Unlock many objects according to isolation level
6965  *
6966  * return: nothing..
6967  *
6968  * lockset(in):
6969  *
6970  */
6971 void
6972 lock_unlock_objects_lock_set (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, LC_LOCKSET * lockset)
6973 {
6974 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
6975  return;
6976 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
6977  int tran_index; /* transaction table index */
6978  TRAN_ISOLATION isolation; /* transaction isolation level */
6979  LOCK reqobj_class_unlock;
6980  OID *oid, *class_oid;
6981  int i;
6982 
6983  if (lockset == NULL)
6984  {
6985  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lk_unlock_objects_lockset",
6986  "NULL lockset pointer");
6987  return;
6988  }
6989 
6990  tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p);
6991  isolation = logtb_find_isolation (tran_index);
6992 
6993  if (isolation == TRAN_SERIALIZABLE || isolation == TRAN_REPEATABLE_READ)
6994  {
6995  return; /* Nothing to release */
6996  }
6997  else if (isolation != TRAN_READ_COMMITTED)
6998  {
6999  assert (0);
7000  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_UNKNOWN_ISOLATION, 2, isolation, tran_index);
7001  return;
7002  }
7003 
7004  assert (isolation == TRAN_READ_COMMITTED);
7005 
7006  reqobj_class_unlock = lockset->reqobj_class_lock;
7007  if (reqobj_class_unlock == X_LOCK)
7008  {
7009  return; /* Don't release the lock */
7010  }
7011 
7012  for (i = 0; i < lockset->num_reqobjs_processed; i++)
7013  {
7014  oid = &lockset->objects[i].oid;
7015  if (OID_ISNULL (oid) || lockset->objects[i].class_index == -1)
7016  {
7017  continue;
7018  }
7019 
7020  class_oid = &lockset->classes[lockset->objects[i].class_index].oid;
7021  if (OID_ISNULL (class_oid))
7022  {
7023  continue;
7024  }
7025 
7026  /* The intentional lock on the higher lock granule must be kept. */
7027  lock_unlock_object_by_isolation (thread_p, tran_index, isolation, class_oid, oid);
7028  }
7029 #endif /* !SERVER_MODE */
7030 }
7031 
7032 /*
7033  * lock_unlock_classes_lock_hint - Unlock many hinted classes according to
7034  * transaction isolation level
7035  *
7036  * return: nothing..
7037  *
7038  * lockhint(in): Description of hinted classses
7039  *
7040  */
7041 void
7042 lock_unlock_classes_lock_hint (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, LC_LOCKHINT * lockhint)
7043 {
7044 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
7045  return;
7046 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
7047  int tran_index; /* transaction table index */
7048  TRAN_ISOLATION isolation; /* transaction isolation level */
7049  int i;
7050 
7051  if (lockhint == NULL)
7052  {
7053  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lk_unlock_classes_lockhint",
7054  "NULL lockhint pointer");
7055  return;
7056  }
7057 
7058  /* If there is nothing to unlock, returns */
7059  if (lockhint->num_classes <= 0)
7060  {
7061  return;
7062  }
7063 
7064  tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p);
7065  isolation = logtb_find_isolation (tran_index);
7066 
7067  switch (isolation)
7068  {
7069  case TRAN_SERIALIZABLE:
7070  case TRAN_REPEATABLE_READ:
7071  return; /* nothing to do */
7072 
7073  case TRAN_READ_COMMITTED:
7074  for (i = 0; i < lockhint->num_classes; i++)
7075  {
7076  if (OID_ISNULL (&lockhint->classes[i].oid) || lockhint->classes[i].lock == NULL_LOCK)
7077  {
7078  continue;
7079  }
7080  lock_unlock_inst_locks_of_class_by_isolation (thread_p, tran_index, isolation, &lockhint->classes[i].oid);
7081  }
7082  return;
7083 
7084  default: /* TRAN_UNKNOWN_ISOLATION */
7085  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_UNKNOWN_ISOLATION, 2, isolation, tran_index);
7086  return;
7087  }
7088 #endif /* !SERVER_MODE */
7089 }
7090 
7091 /*
7092  * lock_unlock_all - Release all locks of current transaction
7093  *
7094  * return: nothing
7095  *
7096  * Note:Release all locks acquired by the current transaction.
7097  *
7098  * This function must be called at the end of the transaction.
7099  */
7100 void
7101 lock_unlock_all (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p)
7102 {
7103 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
7104  lk_Standalone_has_xlock = false;
7105  pgbuf_unfix_all (thread_p);
7106 
7107  return;
7108 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
7109  int tran_index;
7110  LK_TRAN_LOCK *tran_lock;
7111  LK_ENTRY *entry_ptr;
7112 
7113  tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p);
7114  tran_lock = &lk_Gl.tran_lock_table[tran_index];
7115 
7116  /* remove all instance locks */
7117  entry_ptr = tran_lock->inst_hold_list;
7118  while (entry_ptr != NULL)
7119  {
7120  assert (tran_index == entry_ptr->tran_index);
7121 
7122  lock_internal_perform_unlock_object (thread_p, entry_ptr, true, false);
7123  entry_ptr = tran_lock->inst_hold_list;
7124  }
7125 
7126  /* remove all class locks */
7127  entry_ptr = tran_lock->class_hold_list;
7128  while (entry_ptr != NULL)
7129  {
7130  assert (tran_index == entry_ptr->tran_index);
7131 
7132  lock_internal_perform_unlock_object (thread_p, entry_ptr, true, false);
7133  entry_ptr = tran_lock->class_hold_list;
7134  }
7135 
7136  /* remove root class lock */
7137  entry_ptr = tran_lock->root_class_hold;
7138  if (entry_ptr != NULL)
7139  {
7140  assert (tran_index == entry_ptr->tran_index);
7141 
7142  lock_internal_perform_unlock_object (thread_p, entry_ptr, true, false);
7143  }
7144 
7145  /* remove non2pl locks */
7146  while (tran_lock->non2pl_list != NULL)
7147  {
7148  /* remove the non2pl entry from transaction non2pl list */
7149  entry_ptr = tran_lock->non2pl_list;
7150  tran_lock->non2pl_list = entry_ptr->tran_next;
7151 
7152  assert (tran_index == entry_ptr->tran_index);
7153 
7154  if (entry_ptr->granted_mode == INCON_NON_TWO_PHASE_LOCK)
7155  {
7156  tran_lock->num_incons_non2pl -= 1;
7157  }
7158  /* remove the non2pl entry from resource non2pl list and free it */
7159  lock_remove_non2pl (thread_p, entry_ptr, tran_index);
7160  }
7161 
7162  lock_clear_deadlock_victim (tran_index);
7163 
7164  pgbuf_unfix_all (thread_p);
7165 #endif /* !SERVER_MODE */
7166 }
7167 
7168 static LK_ENTRY *
7169 lock_find_tran_hold_entry (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int tran_index, const OID * oid, bool is_class)
7170 {
7171 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
7172  return NULL;
7173 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
7174  LF_TRAN_ENTRY *t_entry = thread_get_tran_entry (thread_p, THREAD_TS_OBJ_LOCK_RES);
7175  LK_RES_KEY search_key;
7176  LK_RES *res_ptr;
7177  LK_ENTRY *entry_ptr;
7178  int rv;
7179 
7180  if (is_class)
7181  {
7182  return lock_find_class_entry (tran_index, oid);
7183  }
7184 
7185  /* search hash */
7186  search_key = lock_create_search_key ((OID *) oid, NULL);
7187  if (search_key.type != LOCK_RESOURCE_ROOT_CLASS)
7188  {
7189  /* override type; we don't insert here, so class_oid is neither passed to us nor needed for the search */
7190  search_key.type = (is_class ? LOCK_RESOURCE_CLASS : LOCK_RESOURCE_INSTANCE);
7191  }
7192  rv = lf_hash_find (t_entry, &lk_Gl.obj_hash_table, (void *) &search_key, (void **) &res_ptr);
7193  if (rv != NO_ERROR)
7194  {
7195  return NULL;
7196  }
7197 
7198  if (res_ptr == NULL)
7199  {
7200  /* not found */
7201  return NULL;
7202  }
7203 
7204  entry_ptr = res_ptr->holder;
7205  for (; entry_ptr != NULL; entry_ptr = entry_ptr->next)
7206  {
7207  if (entry_ptr->tran_index == tran_index)
7208  {
7209  break;
7210  }
7211  }
7212 
7213  pthread_mutex_unlock (&res_ptr->res_mutex);
7214  return entry_ptr;
7215 #endif
7216 }
7217 
7218 /*
7219  * lock_get_object_lock - Find the acquired lock mode
7220  *
7221  * return:
7222  *
7223  * oid(in): target object ientifier
7224  * class_oid(in): class identifier of the target object
7225  * tran_index(in): the transaction table index of target transaction.
7226  *
7227  * Note:Find the acquired lock on the given object by the given transaction.
7228  * Currently, the value of the "tran_index" must not be NULL_TRAN_INDEX.
7229  *
7230  * If this function is changed in order to allow NULL_TRAN_INDEX to be
7231  * transferred as the value of the "tran_index", this function will
7232  * find the resulting lock acquired by all transactions holding a lock
7233  * on the given OID (The most powerful lock, actually a combination of
7234  * the locks).
7235  */
7236 LOCK
7237 lock_get_object_lock (const OID * oid, const OID * class_oid, int tran_index)
7238 {
7239 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
7240  return X_LOCK;
7241 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
7242  LOCK lock_mode = NULL_LOCK; /* return value */
7243  LK_TRAN_LOCK *tran_lock;
7244  LK_ENTRY *entry_ptr;
7245  THREAD_ENTRY *thread_p = thread_get_thread_entry_info ();
7246  int rv;
7247 
7248  if (oid == NULL)
7249  {
7250  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lk_get_object_lock", "NULL OID pointer");
7251  return NULL_LOCK;
7252  }
7253  if (tran_index == NULL_TRAN_INDEX)
7254  {
7255  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lk_get_object_lock", "NULL_TRAN_INDEX");
7256  return NULL_LOCK;
7257  }
7258 
7259  /* get a pointer to transaction lock info entry */
7260  tran_lock = &lk_Gl.tran_lock_table[tran_index];
7261 
7262  /*
7263  * case 1: root class lock
7264  */
7265  /* get the granted lock mode acquired on the root class oid */
7266  if (OID_EQ (oid, oid_Root_class_oid))
7267  {
7268  rv = pthread_mutex_lock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
7269  if (tran_lock->root_class_hold != NULL)
7270  {
7271  lock_mode = tran_lock->root_class_hold->granted_mode;
7272  }
7273  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
7274  return lock_mode; /* might be NULL_LOCK */
7275  }
7276 
7277  /*
7278  * case 2: general class lock
7279  */
7280  /* get the granted lock mode acquired on the given class oid */
7281  if (class_oid == NULL || OID_EQ (class_oid, oid_Root_class_oid))
7282  {
7283  entry_ptr = lock_find_tran_hold_entry (thread_p, tran_index, oid, true);
7284  if (entry_ptr != NULL)
7285  {
7286  lock_mode = entry_ptr->granted_mode;
7287  }
7288  return lock_mode; /* might be NULL_LOCK */
7289  }
7290 
7291  entry_ptr = lock_find_tran_hold_entry (thread_p, tran_index, class_oid, true);
7292  if (entry_ptr != NULL)
7293  {
7294  lock_mode = entry_ptr->granted_mode;
7295  }
7296 
7297  /* If the class lock mode is one of S_LOCK, X_LOCK or SCH_M_LOCK, the lock is held on the instance implicitly. In
7298  * this case, there is no need to check instance lock. If the class lock mode is SIX_LOCK, S_LOCK is held on the
7299  * instance implicitly. In this case, we must check for a possible X_LOCK on the instance. In other cases, we must
7300  * check the lock held on the instance. */
7301  if (lock_mode == SCH_M_LOCK)
7302  {
7303  return X_LOCK;
7304  }
7305  else if (lock_mode != S_LOCK && lock_mode != X_LOCK)
7306  {
7307  if (lock_mode == SIX_LOCK)
7308  {
7309  lock_mode = S_LOCK;
7310  }
7311  else
7312  {
7313  lock_mode = NULL_LOCK;
7314  }
7315 
7316  entry_ptr = lock_find_tran_hold_entry (thread_p, tran_index, oid, false);
7317  if (entry_ptr != NULL)
7318  {
7319  lock_mode = entry_ptr->granted_mode;
7320  }
7321  }
7322 
7323  return lock_mode; /* might be NULL_LOCK */
7324 #endif /* !SERVER_MODE */
7325 }
7326 
7327 /*
7328  * lock_has_lock_on_object -
7329  *
7330  * return:
7331  *
7332  * oid(in): target object ientifier
7333  * class_oid(in): class identifier of the target object
7334  * tran_index(in): the transaction table index of target transaction.
7335  * lock(in): the lock mode
7336  *
7337  * Note: Find whether the transaction holds an enough lock on the object
7338  *
7339  */
7340 int
7341 lock_has_lock_on_object (const OID * oid, const OID * class_oid, int tran_index, LOCK lock)
7342 {
7343 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
7344  return 1;
7345 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
7346  LOCK granted_lock_mode = NULL_LOCK;
7347  LK_TRAN_LOCK *tran_lock;
7348  LK_ENTRY *entry_ptr;
7349  THREAD_ENTRY *thread_p = thread_get_thread_entry_info ();
7350  int rv;
7351 
7352  if (oid == NULL)
7353  {
7354  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lock_has_lock_on_object", "NULL OID pointer");
7355  return ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT;
7356  }
7357  if (tran_index == NULL_TRAN_INDEX)
7358  {
7359  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT, 2, "lock_has_lock_on_object", "NULL_TRAN_INDEX");
7360  return ER_LK_BAD_ARGUMENT;
7361  }
7362 
7363  /* get a pointer to transaction lock info entry */
7364  tran_lock = &lk_Gl.tran_lock_table[tran_index];
7365 
7366  /*
7367  * case 1: root class lock
7368  */
7369  /* get the granted lock mode acquired on the root class oid */
7370  if (OID_EQ (oid, oid_Root_class_oid))
7371  {
7372  rv = pthread_mutex_lock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
7373  if (tran_lock->root_class_hold != NULL)
7374  {
7375  granted_lock_mode = tran_lock->root_class_hold->granted_mode;
7376  }
7377  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
7378  return (lock_Conv[lock][granted_lock_mode] == granted_lock_mode);
7379  }
7380 
7381  /*
7382  * case 2: general class lock
7383  */
7384  /* get the granted lock mode acquired on the given class oid */
7385  if (class_oid == NULL || OID_EQ (class_oid, oid_Root_class_oid))
7386  {
7387  entry_ptr = lock_find_tran_hold_entry (thread_p, tran_index, oid, true);
7388  if (entry_ptr != NULL)
7389  {
7390  granted_lock_mode = entry_ptr->granted_mode;
7391  }
7392  return (lock_Conv[lock][granted_lock_mode] == granted_lock_mode);
7393  }
7394 
7395  entry_ptr = lock_find_tran_hold_entry (thread_p, tran_index, class_oid, true);
7396  if (entry_ptr != NULL)
7397  {
7398  granted_lock_mode = entry_ptr->granted_mode;
7399  if (lock_Conv[lock][granted_lock_mode] == granted_lock_mode)
7400  {
7401  return 1;
7402  }
7403  }
7404 
7405  /*
7406  * case 3: object lock
7407  */
7408  /* get the granted lock mode acquired on the given instance/pseudo oid */
7409  entry_ptr = lock_find_tran_hold_entry (thread_p, tran_index, oid, false);
7410  if (entry_ptr != NULL)
7411  {
7412  granted_lock_mode = entry_ptr->granted_mode;
7413  return 1;
7414  }
7415 
7416  return 0;
7417 #endif /* !SERVER_MODE */
7418 }
7419 
7420 /*
7421  * lock_has_xlock - Does transaction have an exclusive lock on any resource ?
7422  *
7423  * return:
7424  *
7425  * Note:Find if the current transaction has any kind of exclusive lock
7426  * on any lock resource.
7427  */
7428 bool
7429 lock_has_xlock (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p)
7430 {
7431 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
7432  return lk_Standalone_has_xlock;
7433 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
7434  int tran_index;
7435  LK_TRAN_LOCK *tran_lock;
7436  LOCK lock_mode;
7437  LK_ENTRY *entry_ptr;
7438  int rv;
7439 
7440  /*
7441  * Exclusive locks in this context mean IX_LOCK, SIX_LOCK, X_LOCK and
7442  * SCH_M_LOCK. NOTE that U_LOCK are excluded from exclusive locks.
7443  * Because U_LOCK is currently for reading the object.
7444  */
7445  tran_index = LOG_FIND_THREAD_TRAN_INDEX (thread_p);
7446  tran_lock = &lk_Gl.tran_lock_table[tran_index];
7447  rv = pthread_mutex_lock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
7448 
7449  /* 1. check root class lock */
7450  if (tran_lock->root_class_hold != NULL)
7451  {
7452  lock_mode = tran_lock->root_class_hold->granted_mode;
7453  if (lock_mode == X_LOCK || lock_mode == IX_LOCK || lock_mode == SIX_LOCK || lock_mode == SCH_M_LOCK)
7454  {
7455  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
7456  return true;
7457  }
7458  }
7459 
7460  /* 2. check general class locks */
7461  entry_ptr = tran_lock->class_hold_list;
7462  while (entry_ptr != NULL)
7463  {
7464  lock_mode = entry_ptr->granted_mode;
7465  if (lock_mode == X_LOCK || lock_mode == IX_LOCK || lock_mode == SIX_LOCK || lock_mode == SCH_M_LOCK)
7466  {
7467  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
7468  return true;
7469  }
7470  entry_ptr = entry_ptr->tran_next;
7471  }
7472 
7473  /* 3. checking instance locks is not needed. According to MGL ptotocol, an exclusive class lock has been acquired
7474  * with intention mode before an exclusive instance is acquired. */
7475 
7476  pthread_mutex_unlock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
7477  return false;
7478 #endif /* !SERVER_MODE */
7479 }
7480 
7481 #if defined(ENABLE_UNUSED_FUNCTION)
7482 /*
7483  * lock_has_lock_transaction - Does transaction have any lock on any resource ?
7484  *
7485  * return:
7486  *
7487  * tran_index(in):
7488  *
7489  * Note:Find if given transaction has any kind of lock.
7490  * Used by css_check_for_clients_down() to eliminate needless pinging.
7491  */
7492 bool
7493 lock_has_lock_transaction (int tran_index)
7494 {
7495 #if !defined (SERVER_MODE)
7496  return lk_Standalone_has_xlock;
7497 #else /* !SERVER_MODE */
7498  LK_TRAN_LOCK *tran_lock;
7499  bool lock_hold;
7500  int rv;
7501 
7502  tran_lock = &lk_Gl.tran_lock_table[tran_index];
7503  rv = pthread_mutex_lock (&tran_lock->hold_mutex);
